The decor at the hotel is very tasteful and bed very comfortable. I was upgraded to a room with a steam room/shower which was just wonderful. Great swimming pool, which is a pretty reasonable size. Good buffet breakfast, although you might have to wait a little bit to be seated at peak times. I was always seated pretty much straight away. The hotel is so well situated. The MRT is just around the corner, with Bugis Street (Kampong Glam) only 1 stop away and Orchard Road 2 stops.. The Peranakan Museum is a 3 min walk, river 5 min walk and Merlion 10-15 minute walk, with Marina Bay Sands/Gardens By The Bay, another 15 mins.

title: Exceptional Service
desc: I had an incredible stay at this hotel, thanks to the exceptional service provided by Allysha. Not only were she attentive and courteous throughout my visit, but also surprised me with a room upgrade that truly made my experience unforgettable. The dedication of her to ensuring my comfort and enjoyment was evident in every interaction. Her kindness and willingness to go the extra mile are truly commendable. This upgrade added an extra layer of luxury to my stay, and I couldn't be more grateful for her generosity. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a remarkable and personalized hospitality experience.

title: Good restaurant!
desc: We went to the Tablescape restaurant in a casual Sunday night as a family. Ordered a la cart menu coz we want to taste more things. The food is great and the service is excellent! Especially the octopus and sea bass is amazing! Just know that it moved from ground floor to third floor therefore it is a little hard to find the restaurant now.

title: This hotel will be my first choice if I stay in Singapore
desc: Choosing Grand park City Hall hotel was correct choice without doubt. The location of the hotel is near the MRT station and many scenes, such as Peranakan museum, children museum, Jumbo, songfa and the old police station. Mr Louis is a very warm hearted person I have met in the hotel. He kindly showed me the way to the 328 restaurant. I enjoyed the stay in this hotel and feeled the hospitality from the staff. What's moreÔºåtheir swimming pool is clean. If I go to Singapore againÔºåthis hotel will be my first choice.

title: Highly recommended stay!
desc: We love the architectural and monochrome features of this hotel. This is our 3rd time spending family quality time in this hotel. The kids pool are so convenient and it surrounds the bigger pool. It makes monitoring your kids easier while you soak yourself into the warmness of the pool. The check in was smooth. I would like to compliment staff Allysha sho makes the early check jn smooth. She makes waiting easier and ensure our room is properly equipped. We were given a room upgrade too. We would definitely come again for our next stay. Thank you for the awesome, friendly and smooth service.

title: August 2023
desc: Pros. Location is great, especially if you want to visit Fort Canning Park and Raffles. Porter who helped us with our luggage was very kind and the reception staff were nice during check-in, but apart from that we didn't meet or see any other staff during the 3-night stay. Pool was clean but only 6 sun beds on land and then around 10 located in the pool water. Cons. Room was very tired and some dirt and mold in the bathroom and shower grouting. The bathroom bin was also very unclean. No light switches next to the bed. The keypad to operate the lights and ceiling fan was away from the bed and difficult to use even with the included manual. No staff operating the pool such as bar staff for drink by the pool or lifeguard.

title: Excellent Service
desc: The hotel accommodation was so smooth and the receptionist at front office is very friendly and approachable as well as the hotel staffs. Everything was amazing especially all the staff at club lounge are so friendly , they were very attentive and helpful even they were so busy. Our whole family really enjoyed our stay at the Grand Park City Hall. üòä Highly recommended if you‚Äôre planning to visit Singapore, great location and good value.

title: Perfect!
desc: From the moment we checked in we were looked after! From the people at reception who were very accomodating and the staff in the crystal club ( Gladys, kher xian and Nani ) who had our table ready every morning for us! Who also made sure the kids had pancakes and waffles cooked every morning! This stay has been amazing! Very close to mrt and shops also! Room is clean and very comfortable, we stayed in an adjoining family room. Would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Great visit
desc: We had a lovely time at the Grand Park City Hall, where the guest experience manager, Sufri, helped give us nice accomodations. Thank u for the room upgrade . Nice hotel to stay in We will definitely be back another time.

title: Don't go - save your money
desc: Overall it was a terrible experience since the moment we walked in. We walked in late, around 11:30pm, I had messaged the guest relations and the front office regarding our ETA and they were all okay. We arrive and no one was by the lobby at the G floor and then when we arrived at the reception, the only person working at the desk did not even acknoledge us with a smile/nod/anything. This is not the standard that it used to be in 2018, or a 5 star hotel standard. We were waiting for 15 min so we decided to do the App checking, but we didn't have any cards so when we bumped into some staff by the list we asked for the keys. We arrived to our room and it was not clean, there was dusk everywhere, the floor was not clean but sticky and the shower had BLACK MOLD. When I saw the

title: Best Stay in Awhile
desc: Staff were super friendly & accommodating, room was also super clean and spacious! Thank you Aini & Sufri for decorating the room for our anniversary & the complimentary chocolate cake as well which was top tier! Superb üëç

title: Unforgettable Staycation
desc: Celebrated our 15years wedding anniversary. The staffs were very friendly throughout our stay. Manager Sufri and another lady Atiqah helped us to ensure that we had a good stay as we had kids with us. They even decorated the room for us. Overall, it was a very good stay. Will return for another staycation soon!

title: Great location, beautifully designed rooms, great hospitality
desc: Stayed here many times, staff is always very attentive, location is very central with good access for both business and leisure. The rooms are beautifully designed. The working desk is not optimal but it is ok for short work.

title: Lovely afternoon tea
desc: Went for afternoon tea at Tablescape. Attentive staff who gave good advice on the food, nice quiet atmosphere, also gave complimentary carpark voucher which was so nice of them. Thanks Joseph for the excellent service!

title: Grand Park City Hall review
desc: The hotel location is perfectly located centrally to all Singapore CBD. The hotel has no in room mini bar & its in room coffee/tea options are very limited. The hotel itself does not have adequate guest services post check out (lounge/bar/showers etc) The pool is heated so makes swimming extremely enjoyable.

title: Beautiful hotel and lovely staff
desc: We had a wonderful stay at the Grand Park City Hall- staff are all very helpful especially the lovely gentlemen at the arrival foyer - a special.memtion to Lonie who has the most beautiful smile and greeted us everyday and assisted us with our queries. The hotel is very central to all attractions Singapore has to offer. Highly reccomend Grand Park City Hall .

title: Good hospitality
desc: I had the pleasure of experiencing exceptional hospitality from Sufri during my stay for my birthday. His attentiveness and warm demeanour truly made me feel at home. The hotel's ambiance was delightful, creating a perfect atmosphere for relaxation. In addition, the efficient amenities provided added great convenience to my stay.

title: Crystal Club Lounge
desc: Hotel is great. We enjoyed the evening cocktails at Crystal club lounge and it was made outstanding thanks to Mayshell and Gladys who went extra mile with excellent service ! Keep up the great work. Double thumbs up.

title: Central location, some great staff, but several shortcomings
desc: This hotel is splat in the middle of CBD, so the location is convenient. The breakfast is quite expansive and well done. The cleaning staff is prompt and professional. In particular, Zariah was great. She accommodated request for an off-the-schedule cleanup of our room. The front desk staff was often too busy (the ratio of front desk staff to guests often felt insufficient) and did not seem to have the authority to approve of simple requests like an upgrade for an Expedia Platinum member. There is no business center where one can take a business call.

title: Pleasant surprise
desc: I was pleasanty surprised with the complimentary room upgrade provided Mr. Sufri who was extremely professional and courteous. It was the icing on the cake for my first visit to Singapore. I would definitely come again.

title: Amazing Experience in the Crystal Club
desc: This is quite a gem of a hotel in downtown Singapore. It's perfectly connected to everything you might want to do. We decided to stay in their Crystal Club rooms and we are so glad we did because the service and attention to detail was flawless. You start your stay by checking in on the 9th floor and while your being checked in you can enjoy a nice espresso coffee or soft drink in the Crystal Lounge. Our room was well appointed and very clean on the 10th floor with daily housekeeping service and fancy soaps and extras. Breakfast was available on the 3rd or the 9th floors but we opted for breakfast on the 9th in the Crystal Lounge as it was very quiet with a great city view. The buffet breakfast had lot's to choose from including eggs made to order (the omelette was to die

title: Grand Park City Hall Hotel, Singapore
desc: Not 5 star standard. 3 to 3.5 stars at best. The amenities and facilities are limited and not much information is provided to guests. Room controls are not that easy to use. Conveniently located. Staff are friendly. (Big compliment to Joseph in the Lounge who was very engaging). the western breakfasts provided were poor.

title: Unexpectedly amazing
desc: Didn't expect the hotel to be as good as it was! The room the bed the toilet everything was top notch. I especially loved the fact I could control the light, fan and aircon using my phone. That was super useful so I don't even have to get out of bed to change them according to what I need :) Sukri and Safura were very attentive and just knew what I needed before I even said them! Props to them. Will surely look to choose this hotel when I come over again next time.

title: Great Hotel with Great Staff
desc: Visited Singapore with my mum. Booked a Deluxe Club Room. On check-in we were upgraded to a Premier Club Room which includes a free-standing bathtub in addition to a separate shower. Arrived around 6.45pm and were immediately shown up to the Crystal Club Lounge and invited to enjoy the small evening buffet and drinks, which is held 6pm-8pm every evening. Great start to our stay! Next morning we headed to the club lounge for breakfast. The best thing about the lounge was that it was very quiet compared to the main restaurant. The lovely servers brought us our coffee order as soon as we were seated and then took our individual egg orders. The club lounge also served afternoon tea from 2pm-4pm. We sometimes popped in a bit earlier but the staff were happy to bring out the

title: Wonderful experience at Tablescape restaurant & Barp
desc: We had a wonderful birthday celebration at Tablescape restaurant & bar. Thank you Thanisha for the great & warm service, and chef Anbu for the delicious food. We loved the baby abalone soup, the cod fish, as well as the durian dessert. We will be back again.

title: This is a lovely hotel for travellers and family. Nice room and very convenient to city. Breakfast is nice . Recommended
desc: Really nice experience, nice room, nice bathroom Very convenient Close to the city, shopping mall is near by Walking distance to MRT bell boy is very kind and friendly Room size is good and having sofa Breakfast is nice Recommend for vacation and family

title: Beautiful Hotel and Love our stay!
desc: This is our first stay with this hotel. I must say I absolutely love this hotel, from their hospitality to their breakfast selection in their lounge. Hotel is beautiful. Location is fantastic with walking distance to Chimes, National Gallery, Parliament House, Merlion Park. Children Museum is just across the road. Many eateries and shopping malls around. Special thanks to their hotel counter staff, Allysha, for being helpful and friendly! She is concerned with my elderly mum who has walking difficulties, and she made sure our room are not located too far from lift lobby. Also, special thanks to the concierge staffs for their warm smile and greetings every time we meet at lobby. Overall, we love our stay and would definitely return to this hotel in our next visit!

title: We recommend to stay at Grand Park
desc: - The service-level is great (e.g. ground floor, taxi service). - The location is super central - Malls, Museums (e.g. National Museum) in walking distance. - Room Service: ok - Breakfast: Espresso, Omelette, Honey, Fruit, Pancakes, choice of cereals minimal - Room: we enjoyed - Pool: we enjoyed - Gym: cool but we did not make it - Staff: super friendly - Breakfast in Chrystal Lounge: less busy - members only

title: Family Holiday
desc: nice hotel with friendly staff. Location is the main reason we picked it as you can walk to most places. Clean and tidy and enjoyed our stay. Would recommend hotel for the overall experience ..Thank you.

title: Fantastic relaxing hotel
desc: We have stayed in this beautiful hotel before , it is close to the rail and easy access to everything you need in Singapore. We always book the Crystal Club as the staff are lovely Mayshell, Gladys and Nani . Thank you for a lovely stay

title: Fantastic service..Loved the atmosphere here. Staffs are very helpful. Had a great time here ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.
desc: Mayshell was so lovely staff . She did an amazing job so down to earth person . We enjoyed staying at here and crystals lounge is amazing well treated. Food was fantastic . Overall we had a great time here

title: Great service and customer focus
desc: Very attentive and respectful service in the main restaurant bar, very knowledgeable and engaging staff. I really enjoyed the meal, very good Nasi Goreng. The pool was good for a workout in the morning as well. I'd definitely look at returning on future business trips.

title: Heavenly stay!
desc: Superb hotel. Stayed for more than 3 weeks for business matters. Communication was clear. Room was spacious. Amenities were modern. Room service was on point. Pool was nice with bar, gym was quite small but it didn‚Äôt affect the full experience. Breakfast was always fresh and delicious. Front-desk was also friendly and very helpful. Oh and I got some complimentary snacks and drinks due to my long stay. I had fun! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: nice
desc: Very good hotel, the front desk service is very good, the language communication is smooth, happy to stay. The hotel interior environment is good, the geographical location in the city center of Singapore, very convenient place, I like this.

title: Very bad hotel - avoid if you can
desc: Bad service and facilities. My room was not cleaned on 7/11 morning. I called in the afternoon and the front desk promised to clean it in the afternoon. But it was not cleaned till I returned at 11PM... Frustrated with this whole experience...

title: Nice stay
desc: Nice hotel in a good situation. 15 min walking from the Merlior Nice and helpful concierges Breakfast a bit short for European food because there were just some Croissants and some cheese. I miss someone making omelettes

title: Great updated hotel with friendly personnel
desc: My experience was among the top experiences of my business travels and I am a seasoned traveler. The rooms are spacious, quiet, and comfortable with all the amenities needed for business travel. Grand Park is centrally located so many things including shopping are convenient by walking. Great fireworks and air show during July weekends was a plus. I could always find Happy Hour refreshments and tasty eats at Tablescape or at the many restaurants in the vicinity. The entire Staff is extremely courteous, friendly, helpful and always pleasant. I highly recommend Grand Park and will be staying again in the future.

title: Simply Outstanding
desc: Oh my goodness. We have been treated to a magical stay in Singapore, beginning with the incredible hospitality of the team in our hotel (Grand Park CityHall). HUGE shout out to Kripa, Yasmin, Nani and Mayshell, for whom absolutely nothing appeared to much trouble. Let me give you an example. I asked for soft boiled eggs. What was presented was undercooked to my taste (my problem, not theirs). Next minute they googled different soft boiled eggs from around the world.. came back and showed me, asked me to chose and despite me saying don't worry, 5 minutes later eggs cooked to my exact taste appeared. The food throughout had been amazing, the hotel room immaculate, fantastic showers, honestly we cannot find a single fault in this hotel. We can walk safely from here at any time

title: Great Service
desc: I had a great experience at the Grand Park City Hall hotel. Mayshell took great care of me during my stay with amazing hospitality and service! My crystal room was very nice and comfortable. Loved the fan!

title: Amazing service and tasty treats
desc: We went for high tea at Tablescape to celebrate a birthday. Have tried a few high teas but this one was pretty good value and enjoyable. The highlight was the amazing service provided by Nisa and Rico. They were extremely attentive and prepared a cake for the birthday girl. They even gave us a little photo to commemorate the occasion. Thanks again for the great experience!

title: Great place to stay when traveling with kids
desc: - Walking distance to Fort Canning Park and the Children's Museum - Near a lot of restaurants and shopping centers (Chjimes, Funan Mall, Capitol Theater, Raffles City Mall) - Good breakfast selection - Great service!

title: Overall great stay
desc: Stayed for a work conference with my family for 1 week. It was a lovely stay overall. Clean, comfortable, and staff were accomodating. Ismail/Sakthivel (bellman) was really nice and helpful with our luggages, helping us get transport, always with a smile.

title: Best stay of the year!
desc: Pleasantly surprised to see lots of perks catered for kids such as welcome gift, kids dental kits and colouring sets in the room. These gestures are so thoughtful. The reception and Crystal Club team service were exceptional, i would like to compliment Sufri, Gladys, Kripa., Nani and Cardijn. They ensured our family felt comfortable and they were very helpful and friendly such that my kids warmed up to them quickly. Love the spacious room, the comfy beds, bath tub and the interior. The hotel is also close to NDP venue so we caught the fireworks and NDP flypast up close. We also love how near it is to Raffles City, Art Museum and more! Definitely will come back again very soon.

title: A hotel that make my stay different and enjoyable
desc: Super nice hotel, staff are polite and professional, pretty new and good design, clean and tidy, spacious room with updated facilities, bed is good and comfortable. Restaurant and foods are very good. Definitely have to come back again.

title: Great Service
desc: I went to Singapore with my husband and a friend. We chose to pay for the lounge access at the hotel. We met Gladys Nani ( a server) there who made our trip exceptional. She arranged for us a table at a highly sought after restaurant, provided my husband with a bday cake, and was kind and attentive to our needs. Mtg her was a highlight of our trip.. Hotel also has a great pool, black out curtains, and comfortable beds. Great stop to relax and really get away. Valets and greeters at the hotel were also very friendly and helpful. Thank you all for your service.

title: super value for money
desc: great service, the best value for money..all staff were very helpful and attentive, strategic location as well, close to bus station and MRT, breakfast was awesome as well, will definitely go back again

title: Excellent Service at Crystal Club
desc: Nani and Gladys at the Grand Park Hotel's Crystal Club provided exceptional service during my breakfast experience. Their warm and welcoming demeanor, coupled with their attentive nature, made me feel valued. Their attention to detail was commendable, ensuring a clean and well-stocked table. They were knowledgeable, helpful, and always ready to assist.

title: It was a nice stay
desc: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive and the room was clean. I enjoyed staying here! but I wish the water pressure in the shower was stronger and they change the menu of breakfast a bit every morning. Overall, room condition, service and facilities were good.

title: Grand service at the Grand Park City Hotel
desc: The hotel manager Sufri was so friendly, and helpful. He gave us lots of advice and information of where to go. It was so refreshing on my business trip to get such a lovely welcome upon checking in from Sufri. The hotel itself is beautiful, stylish and clean. The rooms are lovely. It is situated right where everything is happening. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Short stay in Singapore
desc: We stayed at the Crystal lounge at the Grand Park and have been very well looked after by the professional Aini, we loved the breakfast and lovely desserts and the service was excellent from Kripa . We also enjoyed the beautiful pool and recommend the very central location . Thank you for making our stay memorable

title: A fantastic hotel!
desc: Love coming back to Grand Park city hall hotel. It‚Äôs our second visit in the span of 8 months. Great facilities and location. We received fantastic service - especially from Aini! Very close to train station and shopping centres

title: Beautiful oasis in the middle of vibrant centre !
desc: Amazing hotel and service ! Very clean , great location with close and very easy access to bus station an MRT( underground transport) . Various of local and continental breakfast! Beautiful outside swimming pool and fitness , which make you even better feeling you! Would like to mention also the greeting service in the entrance (concierge) especially one of them ISMAILL: He is very helpful, supportive and smiley guy. Also his colleague Sakthi which help me and explained to me how to Take a taxi from Esplanade concert hall and airport! I also would like to thank to Allysha-Sufri from main reception for her fast and friendly service! She is kind very polite and smile girl ‚Ä¶. Just what you need especially before leaving ! I definitely will recommend this hotel and will stay

title: Good customer service
desc: Allysna reception and Sakthivel bellman are the best employees there‚Ä¶the cleaning service at room are very slow‚Ä¶.but hotel location and facilities are good‚Ä¶food is ok‚Ä¶very responsive in assistance us!

title: Perfect experience for our lunch celebration
desc: Went to Tablescape restaurant and bar for celebrating my wife‚Äôs birthday. Here they have very nice staffs, friendly service, and tasty food and desserts!! Both of us enjoyed the meal, specially thanks to Farah, Thanisha, and Mei!!

title: Awesome Experience at the Grand Park City Hall
desc: my wife and i had an amazing stay at the Grand Park City Hall we were well taken care of by the hotel manager Sufri--such a lovely gentleman he had recommended we upgrade our room to a premium suite with the big bathroom, amazing bed, and top floor view---couldn't be happier with the decision!

title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
desc: I traveled with my wife & 15 month old baby and I was there for about 7 days for personal and 3 days for business. This hotel exceeded our expectations with how nice the room & hotel was, but beyond that was the level of service & the amazing staff all throughout our stay and always so accommodating! I almost felt like some of them became family throughout my stay, and as we were there for quite a long time. The breakfast buffet is a MUST! There are SO many options, something for everyone and all SO delicious! They were also beyond accommodating for our baby. They had a nicer high chair than we even own that they set her up with, gave her baby plate ware and plastic silverware, they were so friendly & sweet to her, etc. They really made any more difficult times way smoother and

title: Warm welcome
desc: This review is long overdue, but I finally have the time to write it. I had the pleasure of staying at your hotel during the recent Christmas holidays. Would like to express my heartfelt appreciation for the wonderful experience. We were there to celebrate my friend's birthday. Our room was impeccably modern, spacious, and cozy, providing the perfect atmosphere for a memorable stay. I would like to extend a special commendation to Mr. Sufri, the Guest Experience Manager. His warm and bubbly personality truly enhanced our stay. His exceptional hospitality and attentiveness to detail were truly outstanding. Thank you, Mr. Sufri, for going above and beyond to make our stay so enjoyable. We will definitely recommend Grand Park City Hall to others based on our remarkable

title: Very good service
desc: It was my first time in Singapore and I was really happy that Aini was kind to me The hotel was clean and the restaurant was booked I want to come with my girlfriend next time I will definitely visit again

title: Ideal location, comfortable beds, nice swimming pool
desc: This hotel was great for my friend and I to explore Singapore, with a MTR station within walkable distance and Grab (Uber equivalent) taxis can easily access the hotel entrance. The room itself was modern and clean, sufficient space for 2 large luggages, powerful shower. However the downside is that the control panel for all lights & temperature were on one side of the bed only and it was fairly complicated to navigate at first. There‚Äôs also a lack of hooks to hang clothes/towels in the bathroom and room in general. The highlight of the hotel is the swimming pool on the 4th floor, very chill vibe and big enough to float around & actually swim.

title: A nice stay
desc: The hotel location is good and can walk to most scenery attractions. The room is fine and comfortable. Staff at Reception counter were really sincere and helpful in most aspects. Their treat for birthday guests were great.

title: Fantastic solo vacay
desc: First time here. I was on a solo vacay. I read the reviews and some commented that the rooms did not have the traditional switch and said it was troublesome. Didn't they know that they could use the mobile app. It was seamless for me and I love that you could just use your phone with the features. Service was great. I was attended by Aini and she was a gem of the hotel. Aini was welcoming and really helpful to show me the places to go about since it was my first time in Singapore. Thank you so much!!

title: Best value for the money
desc: Very good experience here. Fair price. Good location with convenient public transport to all the resorts. I booked Crystal Club room located at level 9. Breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktail are all served at this level with high quality of service. A BIG thank to Cardin, Kripa, Maysell, Glady, Maya who looked after us very well during our stay. Very warm and thoughtful! Impressive and thumbs up!

title: Excellence.
desc: An unbelievably inspiring experience at the heart of Singapore. Stellar service at Crystal Club Lounge. Completely proactive & supportive team always thinking about their guests. Thank you very much to Cardijn, Kripa, Gladys, Mayshell & Nani for making this experience unforgettable.

title: Great stay!
desc: This is a great hotel. From the location to room size to the staff. Especially Baalan and the other concierge staff who were extremely helpful. It‚Äôs walking distance from everything - 20 mins to the bay, 10 mins to raffles and the malls all around.

title: Excellent for business training
desc: Ceter location rooms are good and the lounge is very good with excellent service. Close to Musiums and up to 20-30 min ride in the metro to everywhere. The food in the lounge is good especially the breakfast and everything cocktail.

title: Best hospitality
desc: We booked the crystal club for a day on 20th May 2023. The club room is on 9th floor. We greeted by Mayshell when we are checking in. She really help us a lot. Checked-in process was fast and smooth. When the cocktail hour on 6pm - 8pm, she is all alone when serving the guest, at that time she served like 7-8 table at the same time, but she handled it really well food is prepared, drinks also. When checked out, Gladys help us really good also. Check out process was smooth and fast. Room also clean and great. We have a great tine staying here.

title: Great rooms and service
desc: The location is great as a base to explore Singapore. Close to transport links and great food in the neighboring mall. If you like museums, multiple museums including the National Museum and the National Gallery are within walking distance.

title: Clean, accommodating hotel
desc: Our group of 60 lawyers was treated royally during a 4-night stay at Grand Park City Hall. The staff, lead by Yuen, were accommodating and proactive about attending to our needs. I never felt like a second class guest simply because I was with a group. The rooms are huge and clean. Housekeeping comes twice daily (once to clean then again for turndown service, without request). I enjoyed a bath in the stand alone soaking tub. Good water pressure in the shower which has rainforest shower head. I do wish they had face towels rather than only hand towels. I had 1 face towel that the airline had given me (I didnt steal it; it was part of the gift package), and I was forced to use it the entire time at the hotel. I don‚Äôt enjoy not having household necessities when on the road. The

title: One of The Best!
desc: Grand Park City Hall offers not only a strategic location but also excellent service and a great breakfast. The rooms are comfortable and cozy, a lot of pillows means great, and hi-technology made the experience different from other places.

title: Perfect place for exploring Singapore
desc: Faultless room - really good size and bed was extremely comfortable. Great experience with staff, who were able to flag taxi's down for us when needed, but close to transport links to explore all of Singapore.

title: Wonderful stay 10/10 ‚ú®
desc: Room deco is so stunning! I am fully satisfied with the cleanliness and everything. They fulfilled all my request! Check in process is fast! Thumbs up to the staff who assist me during check in (i cant remember a guy name üòÖ) and also manager Sufri/Cardijn)! Sure I will coming back again to this hotel!

title: What a nice stay for three nights.
desc: My first time trying this hotel. Am frequently traveling by myself for business to Singapore and this time with my mom for her first time. Checking in Crystal Club on the 9th floor, and staying on the top, 10th for 3 nights. We enjoyed the hospitality from Cardijn, Mayshell, Kripa, Nami and especially Gladys, who is very diligent and charm that gave us three lovely morning by serving us breakfast at the lounge. Air conditioner is a bit cold in the room though and we are like staying in North Pole. However location and services are so nice that I will definitely come back staying here.

title: Lovely lunch at Tablescape
desc: Had a lovely Mother‚Äôs Day lunch at Tablescape with my wife and family. Service and food is top notch. Thanks to the team Rico, Thanisha & Mei. Thank you for the excellent time. We‚Äôll be back for high tea üòÑ

title: Exceptional services by Kripa and Mayshell
desc: This is my 3rd time staying here and as usual the services was exceptional! The help and service that Kripa and Mayshell provided were exceptional as well! They guide me on the usage of the room amenities as it was my first time staying in the suite. Definitely will be back for many more stays!

title: Highly recommended! Crystal Club@Grand Park City Hall
desc: Stay at Crystal Club Room. Enjoyed Elegant and spacious room with great hospitality and services! Good location as well. Would like to express my special thanks to Mayshell, Kripa and Nani in Crystal Club for his professional and hospitality services! Highly recommended hotel in Singapore. Would like to stay again.

title: Tablescape at Grand Park City Hall
desc: Went for the high tea set at Tablescape @ Grand Park City Hall. Food was great and was served attentively by Thanisha and Farah. We enjoyed our high tea very much. Would definitely return again for high tea.

title: Very pleasant and smooth stay
desc: I stayed at the Grand Park City Hall during a work conference and it was very comfortable and well organised. Staff was efficient and friendly and room is of a good size. The bed is large and very comfort able. Had no issues during my stay and would happily stay there again in future.

title: Amazing customer service.
desc: We had a very pleasant stay. The team of Gladys, Kripa, Cardjin, Mayshell & Nani was nothing but absolutely great!!!! They assisted us from our check in, the needs on our wedding up to our check out. They are an absolute gem!! Thank u very much!

title: AWESOME STAY
desc: On arrival our room was upgraded from Junior suite to Ocean suite which was awesome . Great courteous staff. All service provided was excellent. The ambience at the crystal club was great. An special thanks to Kripa and Nani for swift check in. And Mr Cardijn for his exceptional hospitality at Crystal Club. Very polite and well spoken. Overall it was a wonderful stay at this hotel.

title: Good hotel but poor breakfast
desc: Breakfast is terrible. Everything else is good. It's a good recommendation if you don't need the breakfast. I'd have give it a 4 if it has decent or even normal breakfast offering that's comparable to other hotel.

title: Location is great
desc: location is great, with convenient transportion, as it is close to the MRT, and surrounded by large shopping mall and numerous restaurands, but the room has poor sound insulation and ventilation, easily prone to allergic rhinitis.

title: Awesome experience
desc: We would like to say thank you to the front desk staff, Ms Ash, that attend to us is very friendly and approachable. She upgraded our room with a bathtub as she saw my daughter which is 1 years plus old. We‚Äôve stayed here frequently and all the staff are friendly and helpful. Highly recommended üëçüèºüëçüèº

title: FABULOUS PLACE TO STAY
desc: This is a FABULOUS Hotel. The Breakfast is AMAZING - Great variety. Service is really Good. Staff is VERY Friendly and Kind. The Location is steps to everything. Check in was a breeze and everything was as promised. Truly a 5 Star with very good rates. Loved this Hotel and will recommend it to everyone. Try to Upgrade to the "Club Level" SOOOO worth it for all the extras you get. Will stay here again and will tell everyone else that it is the Perfect Hotel in the Perfect LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION!!!

title: Best Family Staycation
desc: Our family has stayed in different hotels in Singapore for staycation. I don‚Äôt usually write review but our recent staycation at Grand Park City Hall has urged me to share our wonderful experience. We booked the Family Suite for our family of 5, which has 2 connecting rooms with a specially designed kid‚Äôs room. The moment our children stepped into the kid‚Äôs room, Grand Park City Hall immediately ranks No. 1 above the rest. Clean, cozy space, beautifully decorated VIP welcome sweet treats await in both rooms. Kids were delighted to have toy and stationery sets prepared for them. Special birthday treat was delivered to us when the staff realized it was our daughter‚Äôs birthday just a few days ago. The beds and pillows are the most comfortable that we have slept in thus far. Pool

title: Good experiences!
desc: Very kind and all services was good! Every breakfast was good for me. Room condition was always nice. And It was also a great advantage to be close to major tourist attractions. You can walk anywhere if you stay here.

title: Great Hotel Experience!
desc: Awesome Hotel with great room, and so much facilities and with friendly hotel staffs too! Checked In the Hotel with great service from Pak Sufri, The Hotel Manager. April 27 2023. From Bambang & Family. Jakarta, Indonesia.

title: Amazing hotel & Staff
desc: I am so glad we chose Grand Park City Hall for our 5 night visit to Singapore. We splurged on a Crystal Club room, we were welcomed by the lovely Kripa & can't speak more highly of her, Gladys & Cardjin who all made our stay so pleasant & memorable. Their attention to detail during our stay was just wonderful.

title: Splendid Stay
desc: Spent a solid 2 nights here at Grand Park City Hotel. Must say had a pleasant stay with great amount of comfort and cleanliness well kept all around the hotel from entrance to room. Service by reception counter for check in was smooth and easy, room service showed efficiency not any less. Thanks to Front Office Staff Ash, Tiffany, and Lornie for dealing with us professionally and Mei from Tablescape for your assistance. Breakfast was just nice üôÇüëçüèº All the best!

title: Another great weekend
desc: Just passed another super stay at the GPCH. Great appreciation to all the hotel stuff and their service attitude! A special thanks to Marnani, Kripa, Cardijn and to Gladys on the club floor. Will be back soon üëç

title: Wonderful experience for family
desc: We have a wonderful staying experiences with grand park city hall. The staff are very friendly and patience to our needs especially we have big bids and toddler with us. The family room have many activities for the kids such as big blackboard with colorful chalks, tent , coloring activity. The kids never feel bored in the room. Good choice for family with kids and toddlers.

title: Great service
desc: The service provided by Mei and Farah at breakfast restaurant was great, they were extraordinarily kind and they showed the hospitality! Seeing the staff's smile in the morning really made my day, they were also attentive, always asked me if I need anything. I would definitely choose Grand Park hotel again for my next visit. Keep it up!

title: Great location
desc: We stayed for two days, initially in Junior suite and upgraded to Park Suite the next day. The junior suite is great for couple, the steam bath is nice. The Park suite is superb! Must try! Great location too.

title: Staycation review Grand Park City Hall
desc: Decided on this hotel for my recent Staycation as there was a stay 3 nites pay 2 nites promotion. Location was fantastic as it is very near City Hall MRT Station. But what made my day was the duty Manager Sufri. Not only did he allow us an early check in. He upgraded us to a Junior Suite and offered us a discount to the Crystal Club. Needless to say, we were thrilled to learn that we can have most meals at Crystal Club which means more savings for us. We would like to give a shout out to Gladys and Cardujn for their wonderful service at the club. Ever attentive to our needs and ensuring we are enjoying our stay; they have been impeccable in their roles. Last but not least, shout out to Kripa too. Our morning breakfast made pleasant by her constant smile and friendly demeanor.

title: The best experience
desc: I must say this hotel is fantastic if you do book the crystal club is something a bit special you get breakfast, afternoon tea and drinks from 6-8pm the staff are 5 star especially Gladys! Cardin and the manager Imran the main man just exceptional! Thank you guys you made it a great experience!

title: Great location, attentive staff
desc: Great location and newly rennovated hotel, enjoyed my stay here. Pool is inviting and Fort Caning park is great for a walk and run. Loved the Crystal Lounge on 9th floor where I can have breakfast in peace rather than the main restaurant on 3rd floor. Also evening snacks n drink in Lounge worked out perfect for me as I like to eat lightly. Kripa is a wonderful hostess at the Lounge with personalised attention and care. I did change my upgraded room to a normal deluxe room for better view and lighter feel. I could not take the sombre grey of upgraded room. The one pain though in all the rooms is the lighting control panel on the wall. To turn on or off any lights you have to get up from bed and use the clunky panel! I longed for a simple master switch next to bed. And I wish for

title: Absolutely amazing experience!
desc: If you are considering this hotel, I 100% recommend! I have stayed in Singapore a few times, and just got back from 6 nights. It was an amazing trip! I would highly recommend upgrading to one of the Crystal club rooms or higher so you get the daily breakfast, daily refreshments, high tea, and evening cocktails each day. The customer service was brilliant, and nothing was too much for them. Gladys was who I first dealt with in the Crystal Club lounge, and she was amazing! Also Mayshell who served throughout the day - excellent service. In the evenings I usually got served by Kripa and Nani - both very lovely. I can't remember the names of others sorry, but all staff were great. Even Ms Jeane Lim, the General manager of the hotel took the time out to come and ask me if I

title: Great stay in Grand Park
desc: The hotel has a good location. It's walking distance from malls and from the MRT. Their staff are kind and accommodating especially the those working at the restaurant (Rico and Farah). They made sure our stay was comfortable & hassle-free.

title: Short Getaway
desc: Great hotel. Warm wonderful attentive staff. Great location. Walking distance to Boat Quay, Chinatown, Riverside Point, Clarke Quay and Clifford Pier. Transport out on North Bridge Road. We just got back on Monday and we will stay here in again. Thankyou üòÅ

title: Great team. Best in class service
desc: My best friends had their wedding reception at Grand park city hotel and I'm impressed & grateful for the impeccable service provided by the team. The tewm consist of David, Nisha, Rico,Mei, Edward, Andy & Irman. This team was welcoming, patient with our request and tried their best to accomdate us in every possible way. Every request was greeted with a smile. We did not have the best experience dealing with the hotel's mediocre backend team but the team at the wedding banquet really turned the experience around for us. We are thankful to the team and the whole event couldn't have gone so smoothly without their help. I hope Grandpark management would give this team recognition for their dedication and commitment in ensuring the guest experience is top notch. They certainly

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Grand Park City Hall is fantatsic. It was my husband birthday and I left a request and they decorate the room nicely with a cake.The room was clean and nice. We stayed at the crystal club rooms so we were entitled to high tea, evening cocktail and breakfast. The high tea was good but the cocktail and breakfast were fantastic. There were not much food selection but i would say the food was enough. it was served with excellent quality. We enjoyed the hotel and facilities and food alot. Service was excellent too. We had Gladys at the Crystal club level and she has been very helpful and friendly. Will definitely come again.

title: Good first hotel choice in Singapore - location
desc: Nice choice specially for the location. Easy to get everywhere. Got upgraded upon arrival. Room was spacious and comfortable. Interesting steambath went on while trying to figure out the touch pads on the wall controlling the room. There really could be some quidance! Tried the bath one day. Wasn‚Äôt really my cup of tea but could be relaxing for others. Breakfast was ok. Nothing inspiring but fair√∂y good. Swimming pool was good for swimming. Other wise the pool area was out dated. Gym was very small. Service was friendly and excellent. Very happy for this choice as a first hotel in Singapore. Especially for the location.

title: A very pleasant stay with fantastic service!
desc: We were upgraded to this hotel for a two night stay after our cruise. We were also ugraded to a Crystal Club room, just paying for the food/drink component. Mr Sufri was very generous in organising this. The room was spacious and comfortable. I guess the only thing we struggled with was getting used to the control panel on the wall that controlled the lights, fan and air conditioning! Our room was 4 doors from the Club lounge, which made it extremely handy! We must commend Mayshell in particular for her lovely personality in the evenings, and willingness to help. Kripa was also extremely helpful at breakfast time. The service received by all staff in the lounge was great. It's a pity that children are allowed in the lounge, unlike the other hotels we have stayed in, as this

title: Great Location, good value for money stay..will be back
desc: 4 nights stay here in Feb 23 with Crystal Club Access. Room was more than fine, and whilst the bathroom was compact, it was functional. Shower was superb....water hot and plenty of it. Highlight here was the Club...food was excellent; good choices, hot and cold..and changed each night. Brekky soups were not to miss!!. The staff were delightful; attentive and friendly...but had a good handle on people and their needs. Thanks to Mayshell, Nani, Kripa, Cardijn,Kher Xian & Suria. Logistically great, close to MRT, Walking distance to Marina Bay Sands, City Hall and even Orchard Road. Lovely stay, good value for money in what is a pricey Singapore hotel market. Will be back again

title: Great location and outstanding service
desc: The location of this hotel is perfect- walking distance to lots of attractions including the Raffles and Chinatown. Our room was modern and very clean & comfortable, however the thing that makes this hotel really stand out from the rest was the friendly staff and outstanding service. We were made to feel at home from the start and they were all keen to make our experience memorable. Special mentions to Sufri, Aini, Mayshell, Gladys and Chef Judy for making us feel special.

title: Amazing service and hotel
desc: flawless check in by safura. She went extra mile in making sure of my flight details! I‚Äôm so used to fake smiles and here‚Äôs my roomkey but she did it so genuinely. Really amazing service and hotel as well! She is truly a star at grand park. Pls pass this message to her. Only downside was the breakfast buffet was limited

title: Disappointed
desc: I sent this to Tripadvisor before but then cancelled for fear of retribution. But I think you should know. Don‚Äôt understand where you get your reviews. This was one of the worst hotels I have ever stayed in. Check in staff were indifferent, breakfast was ordinary and crowded. Bathroom layout poor - you have to squeeze past the toilet to get to the shower. Shower leaked. No desk. I had to find a UK-style plug adapter (no universal). Lighting/air con remote very awkward. Why not a standard modern key operated remote ? Pool tiny, more like a pond. Photos are deceptive. Hotel service phone didn‚Äôt work. Had to go to 7-Eleven to get ice cubes ! On the other hand, room clean and bed comfy. But you claim 5-Star - really ! And for AUD 600 a night ?

title: Good location
desc: Good location, good breakfast options, nice room with pillow and blanket menus. Air conditioning and light controls were a bit awkward to use. Lobby staff were friendly and helpful. Only problem I thought was the gym needs more equipment.

title: Wonderful staycation at Grand Park City Hall
desc: Our family's stay in Grand Park City Hall was great due to the service personnel at the hotel. From the friendly guest service executive at the front desk (a tall gentleman, my apologies that we did not catch his name) who brought us up to the Crystal Club floor to Mayshell , who was in the Crystal Club Lounge on 17 March 2023. Mayshell was warm and friendly. She was efficient in our check-in process and thoroughly hospitable in taking our food orders and making recommendations for our stay. She even took the initiative to offer us a hot chocolate drink for our two boys.

title: Everything is wonderful ! Friendly staffs, nice service from Ash !
desc: Comfortable stay, friendly staffs, wonderful facilities ! Special thanks to Ash who fed me with more information on places of interest around the vicinity, and for the clarifications on house rules. Delightful experience , and I'm sure I will choose the same place to stay again for future vacations !

title: An excellent stay in a central location.
desc: I stayed at Grand Park City Hall for 5 days in March and was very impressed by the hospitality. I had to re-arrange my arrival late due to a missed flight connection and the hotel were very accommodating. The rooms were immaculate and the staff friendly and approachable. I stayed in the Crystal Club and the complimentary Lounge was one of the best that I have stayed in over the years. I highly recommend GPCH for a central stay and with excellent amenities. Many thanks to Kripa and Nani for your hospitality! Dr Ellis Urquhart

title: fantastic stay at Grand City park hotel
desc: what a fantastic place to stay in Singapore - fantastic location - superb hotel - great facilities and staff - Nazri concierge super helpful - he helped us make the most of our very short stay. Highly recommend staying herr

title: Grand park staycation
desc: On my solo trip of staycation, Manager on duty Ashyy Loh from the front desk was exceptionally accommodating, patient and professional by recommending me all the suitable and ideal facilities available. On top of that the transition from the lobby to the room was smooth and a total peace of mind. Thanks for the wonderful staycation experience!

title: The best experience I could ever of had ü•∞
desc: I can‚Äôt recommend this hotel enough. The rooms are stunning, modern and extremely clean. The ammenities are excellent ü•∞ The staff are absolutely amazing especially the manager Sufri. Sufri made us feel so welcome and nothing was too much for him. He went above and beyond in ensuring we‚Äôre comfortable and happy. I can‚Äôt thank him enough for his kindness and help. I highly recommend whenever you‚Äôre in Singapore this is certainly the place to stay. Ask for Sufri and he will definitely take good care of you ü•∞ Thank you to everyone for making our stay an absolutely heavenly experience

title: Super comfortable hotel in great location with outstanding service
desc: The Grand Park Hotel is super comfy, well decorated and luxurious with an understated charm. The staff is similarly extremely competent, friendly, and I received excellent assistance from Guest experience manager Sufri. The rooms are super nice and modern with a great local touch, with views, and the beds are very comfortable. The breakfast buffet is definitely among the best, with excellent dumplings, on top of the continental choices. Finally the location is very central , very close to City Hall MRT stop on the red line. Behind the hotel is the great Fort Canning Park, perched on a hill, a few steps away. Also the swimming pool and gym are quite good.

title: Clean hotel, great service and good location
desc: Nice and clean hotel room. Love the clean bathtub. Good location and easy to get food. Mr Sufri welcomed us and he was very polite and helpful in our queries. Recommended hotel to stay. Will come again.

title: Good place to stay.
desc: The room was very comfortable. Look out for their pull out fridge and the luggage stand (it is in the wardrobe). The breakfast service was good, they led me right to the table and provided me with tea and milk. The spread was a good spread with many different offerings; catering for almost any cuisine. The lift is a bit tricky though: the room floors show up in the touch panel screen after your key card is scanned.

title: Grand Park hotel in Singapore
desc: Manager Sufr√≠ was very helpful and eager to ensure that our stay was excellent. The room is small by some standards but large by Singapore standards and well equipped. Bathroom provides many amenities, which avoids having to call for specific things.

title: Excellent Service by Grand Park and Tablescape team
desc: We just held our wedding banquet at Grand Park City Hall , Tablescape Restaurant and it was a fantastic experience. We would like to extend our thanks to Glenn, Maricris, Rico and Mei who has been a great help in assisting our queries and request. The wedding went smoothly and the setup was done really beautifully. The 5 course dinner was also delicious! Would definitely recommend all couples to consider Grand Park City Hall as your top choice for your wedding Thanks again for making our special day perfect :) -Nic and Rach

title: Amazing stay, highly recommended
desc: Location is great as it's at central area. It's near to the MRT station and there's a mall nearby. Love the hospitality given by Manager Sufri. He is really kind and helpful. I came with my family, especially with an elderly, he handled it with care. Truly appreciate the service given! Thank you for the lovely stay!

title: Wondering wedding reception, attentive and diligent staff
desc: Attended our friend's wedding dinner here. The evening started with canapes and drinks at the rooftop - the canapes were amazing! There were four different bite-sized delicacies to select from, and was all very delicious. The dinner reception was downstairs at Tablescape restaurant, where we enjoyed a 5-course dinner. The octopus appetizer was a true standout - well cooked and seasoned, and a crowd favorite. All this wouldn't have been possible for the chefs and team members of Grand Park. During dinner, they were attentive and swiftly made sure each guest's water/wine glasses was always filled. We also noticed that they made an effort to reduce movement and surrounding noise from the kitchen/outside bar during the wedding speeches. Thank you Rico, Nisha, David, Farah and Mei

title: solemnisation
desc: Hold solemnisation event at Grand Park City hall. Staff Here were friendly and professional. Have a very good experience at hotel. Thanks Glenn( Sales manager), Rico(Banquet manager), and Mei, Nisha, Farah and all F&B Staff to serve my event. Really good Team!

title: Convenient location and better value
desc: Location was the key deciding factor besides the fact that it was slightly cheaper compared to others in the area. Rooms were clean and housekeeping was good. Coincerge team is good and very helpful. Taxis have to be called but there is a taxi stand short walking distance away.

title: This revirew is just I am going to die in the hotel
desc: This is our corporate rate hotel. I called the reception about 10:45pm a few time and nobody answered. I have asthma and nobody told me that their electricity will go off if you go out from the room for 15 mins. When I come back tonight, the room is totally dark and has no air-cond. The fan was stopped. I called down the reception and nobody answered the call. I went down to the reception and told them my asthma and cannot stay in a stuffy room. They said that they are a green hotel, so all electrcity wilol turn off in 15 mns. They should alert me when they made this change. I stayed here before and it iwas not like that. If I go to ned and die tonight, please pass my message to the public. They should not stay in this hotel if they need air circulation.

title: Good For Business Traveller
desc: Pro: Room & Amenities are great. the only downside is not soundproof enough. Location is great, near Funan Mall and City Hall MRT. Cons: - Breakfast option is limited ( I stayed 6 nights always eat the same ) - Hospitality is not up to 5-star hotel standard.

title: Great staff. Wonderful experience
desc: We arrived early morning exhausted after a 13 hour flight en route to New Zealand. . Allysha went out of her way to help us and we were quickly installed into a Crystal Club room, well ahead of our 3pm check in time. As it was pouring with rain we chose to complete the upgrade and enjoyed wonderful 24 hours of first class service provided by Kripa, Judy and Thomas. They were all so friendly and helpful and made our stay very special and one to remember.

title: Great Hotel & Great Location
desc: 2nd time staying here and this time for my friend birthday. Front desk Sufri (manager) still remember me and he even greeted me with a smile. Our room was given to us with a nice pool view. Overall another great experience staying in this hotel. Will come again soon.

title: Great Hotel, but room controls too technical
desc: We stopped 4 nights at the end of a two month journey, so have experienced a number of hotels along the way. The staff were fantastic, but the hotel doesn't meet 5 star expectations. Our main frustration was the room controls. Everything is controlled digitally from a small box on the wall. We got used to it after the first couple of days, but it doesn't set a good first impression when you arrive tired after a long flight. A phone app that is meant to make things easier never worked properly while we were there. The hotel and rooms are very clean. We enjoyed the lounge for breakfast and evening cocktails. The hospitality staff were lovely and the concierge team very helpful. The hotel is certainly well located, handy for using the transport system and it is also near to many of

title: FABULOUS Valentine Dinner on 14 Feb 2023
desc: Everything from the food, service, set up and wine pairing was perfect. Ingredient was fresh and quality good, as well as attentive service by the staff. Course meal was portioned nicely and fairly price, will definitely go back for other occasions! Special thanks to all the restaurant staff on 14 Feb, 6pm seating which made our night so enjoyable! Thank you!

title: Wonderful stay.
desc: A wonderful hotel. Very clean, very comfy beds, super smart rooms. Be sure to book for the Crystal Club. Drinks and amazing food - on the house! Amazing service from Gladys and Mayshell. Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough.

title: Very satisfied!!!
desc: A great hotel with a lots of shops and restaurants nearby..We got a very tidy, modern room which also has great view towards Marina Bay.. Excellent staff most especially Mayshell, Cardijn, Kripa and Judy at the crystal club lounge. We would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended hotel!!

title: Great location
desc: The hotel was in a great location, next to Funan, near Capitol, Raffles City, and Chijmes. We loved the room decor. We regretted adding on the breakfast though as the variety was quite poor. Friendly staff.

title: A to go hotel
desc: Clean n nice hotel, friendly n helpful receptionist (thanks allysha!), concierge (ismail), delicious smoked salmon for breakfast, in the center of everything. Comfy bed n pillows also, sleep couldnt be better.

title: Best hotel sg
desc: Manager Sufri is very welcoming and has a great personality! Love his customer service will definitely come back again! Recommend the club benefit for evening cocktail and breakfast at level 9. Awesome !! Complimentary late check out also

title: Great Service and Experience in Grand Park
desc: We enjoyed our stay in Grand Park hotel. Everything was perfect! Atikah from the front desk is very attentive and helpful. Thank you for the recommendations and service during our stay in Singapore! We will come back next time!

title: Great service and great experience
desc: Had a great experience staying here. Atikah gave a very good recommendation and provide cery good customer service. She is very cheerful and patient. Will recommend this place to my friends and family.

title: Excellent staycation
desc: We held our wedding here 25 years ago in Grand Plaza Park Royal Hotel now named as Grand Park City Hall. To celebrate our Silver Anniversary, we chose to stay here the night to reminisce and celebrate our union. The staff were were warm and courteous. Surprised even some of the staff 25 years ago were still present. Sufri - Guest Experience Manager even took the effort and time to decorate our room and my wife was really pleased and touched. Comfortable room and hospitable stay. Great location and definitely will come back again! Thanks for the good service guys

title: One of the BEST
desc: Great hotel and amazing service. Kripa from reception was extra helpful and very friendly. Loved the rooms, very clean and the design was unique. Nice pool and love the drinks. One of the best hotels that Ive visited so far, and its in a great location.

title: Not care about regular guests.
desc: I do not want to install app. Want use room as a room. This hotel is the case: you can not normally run the room, cause is ‚Äúsmart‚Äù. It has idiotic touch controls. And hate returning guesses. Avoid the place. I believe others will appreciate their regulars better.

title: A great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Our stay at Grand Park City Hall was excellent - all of the staff we encountered were fantastic, particularly Adam the bellman and his colleagues, along with the Guest Experience team. Our room was very well appointed and all hotel facilities were excellent. Thanks again!

title: Great Hotel in the heart of Singapore
desc: Great location, rooms very well appointed and staff were superb. We really enjoyed our stay here and the hotel was very accomodating with early check after a long haul flight. Thank you for making our time in Singapore special, we will certainly be back.

title: Great central location
desc: Friendly and accommodating staff. Impeccably clean. Centrally located. Seconds from Funan Centre, and City Hall bus terminus and minutes to Raffles City. Daily reakfast, afternoon tea food offerings are great- served and cooked by the very attentive Kripa and Judy in The Chrystal Club Lounge - 9th floor dining space. (Even an outdoor area) Beautiful private swimming pool area. Large roof garden for afternoon drinks

title: Great hotel!
desc: Fantastic breakfast buffet in the Crystal Club at the Grand Park City Hall Hotel. Kripa and Judy are amazing hosts. We loved the fruit, noodles and cappuccino! Hotel conveniently located near Fort Canning Park, Clarke Quay, and Raffles Hotel!

title: Excellent service of Kripa & Judy at crystal club
desc: That‚Äôs my first stay in the hotel, I was served as VIP . Kripa and Judy are excellent on the service at crystal club. They offer nice breakfast, HH drinks. They served in polite way and always keep smiling to keep my day fresh. Very helpful to help me book restaurant and serve my guest as well. Highly recommended and do appreciate the help they did. Excellent

title: Amazing hotel service
desc: Made a call to the hotel because I wanted to make some arrangements to surprise a friend for a bridal shower. Ms Suria assisted me with the preparations on the phone and took the initiative to help me to settle it. During the check in, she also was at the counter and even remembered my room requests. She was very friendly and initiative. Overall, an amazing experience and will definitely return.

title: Super! We enjoyed our stay so much
desc: We went there for our CNY family reunion and stay there for 2 nights. It was amazing stay and we enjoyed the stay so much. The hotel is close to amenities and station. The service was 5 stars and satisfactory . We were well served by Thomas, who was really great always greet us in smiley face . We were really pampered during our stay.

title: Short Break
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel, we were here for 3 nights en-route to Melbourne. The room was spacious and clean, the staff were very accommodating and friendly. We arrived early and they did their best to get us into a room early for which we were grateful after a long flight. We would definitely stay here again, very centrally located.

title: Excellent Place to stay
desc: I love this hotel. The staff, the rooms and the level of service was really excellent. Kripa and Judy went above and beyond and deserve a special mention. The hotel facilities are great. The rooms are spacious and very well designed. I would certainly like to visit again.

title: Grand all round !
desc: Superb, comfortable and spacious room. Sexy bathroom and peaceful ambiance. Our Crystal Club experience was truly extended by the ‚ÄúFabulous Syria‚Äù doing everything she could to make our Club perfect! Gladys is the ‚ÄúCheck In Queen‚Äù making sure everything was Grand !

title: Crystal Club Lounge superb service ‚≠êÔ∏è
desc: My husband and I had the best experience in their Crystal Club Lounge, thanks to Gladys (club manager) and Chef Judy. We started our day with a sumptious breakfast, chef Judy made it more special by serving us her prawn noodles soup and it was sooooo yummy!! Gladys provided us with utmost service. We really appreciate it üòä

title: Superb
desc: The stay here was incredibly pleasant. The room was spacious and comfortable. Sufri, the manager, was very friendly and welcoming! Thomas from the crystal lounge was also very warm and inviting. Definitely an extremely pleasant stay thank you!

title: Crystal Club Lounge
desc: Great service in excellent place. Hospitality is on the highest level. Gladys, Suna and Thomas - perfect personnel at perfect place, care to make Your stay comfortable and relaxing with great food and glass of wine. One will certainly will not leave place disappointed with this close to perfect service... ...and Lady cook assisting with breakfast in the morning in the launch...she is magician to add value to your breakfast not only great taste...look of the served addition is great too Gregory M... (used this place for over 30 days and always, ever this time, use this hotel since 2006 and always satisfied with great service, hospitality and care - sustainable quality...highly recommend, great value added to Your stay in Grand Park City Hall Hotel )

title: Crystal Club Lounge
desc: Check in to the hotel was very easy and quick. Club level rooms are spacious enough and well equipped for a short break. Great service by Suria in the Crystal Club Lounge who was very attentive and friendly.

title: Short stay in Singapore.
desc: Excellent service from Suria and Sakthi in the Crystal Club lounge. Really enjoyed our stay. Excellent housekeeping and comfortable hotel in central Singapore. Well worth visiting. Check in available online all very modern. Room can be totally controlled from your phone. All very interesting.

title: Tip Top!
desc: Was super excited when i saw the hotel was open for public sometime back. So i decided to do staycation here again!! Start point, Level 1 the concierge team have given us the welcome vibes as usual. The reception is clean, smell nice and comfortable. When we arrived, the room was not ready, which truly understand 1st of January. üòÄ Came back again to check and was attended by the GEM ( sorry i forgot ur name , the Malay gentleman ). His customer sevice is soooo thumbs up. My 4 years old son was singing, i want to go swimming pool, i want to go swimming pool and Mr GEM gave him son a good and happy words ok room ready, u can go swimming and your room can see the pool. Thank you for giving us a good vibes for our stay.. not forgetting the room is nice, comfortable and cosy!!

title: Great Hotel
desc: Lovely Hotel in a good location - walking distance to most of the main attractions. We stayed in a delux room with access to The Crystal Lounge. The Room was modern and comfortable and cleaned daily to a high standard. It would have benefitted having more drawer space. The service we received in the Crystal Lounge from Cardijn was first class. Nothing was too much trouble. He explained each night what food was available and ensured our drinks were regularly refreshed. Coma and Thomas were also very helpful The food was excellent and Chef Judy ensured food met our expectations and always gave us recommendations to try and little treats to sample. Her Eggs Benedict was the best we have tasted. We originally booked this Hotel in 2019 prior to Covid. The Hotel very kindly honoured

title: Clean, spacious and will definitely come back!
desc: Lovely experience! Room was clean, spacious and the hotel staff were also very friendly. The only thing is that the restaurants here at not halal-certified. Special shoutout to Suria from the Crystal Club for being so warm and friendly ü´∂üèº She was very sweet and went the extra mile for all guests here. Thanks for serving us cookies! Will definitely come back again!

title: Compliment to Atikah
desc: I am happy with her service. She is very attentive and attend to all my requests. She is friendly and professional on her job. Knowledgeable enough to answer all my queries. Keep it up and kudos to her.

title: Great location and excellent staff!
desc: While visiting Singapore during CNY I stayed here on a suggestion by a friend and it was worth it. I used the self check in method using the application and easily found my room. I used the Crystal Club services regularly and Suria was very helpful and attentive. I was greeted warmly and she provided a few suggestions for things to do in the area. Never underestimate the influence your staff can have on the guests. I'll be back because of the service, the rooms are nice too! üòÄ

title: Friendly staff
desc: We went to reception and requested to extend our stay. Atikah from the reception attended to us and very helpful on the request. She is very accommodating and friendly. Lornie from the concierge also assisted to offer/lend us the use of umbrellas when we went out due to rain. Noticed that the staffs in the hotel keeps smile on their faces and always ready to assist.

title: Luxurious stay with great service!
desc: A hidden gem tucked away in the heart of the city. The hotel staff were warm and friendly, and made us feel welcome. The room was luxurious and well tended to. We visited the executive lounge late in the afternoon and some of the snacks were running low. Suria, the service staff at the lounge, surprised us with a specially prepared serving of fruits. Thank you Suria and the service team for making our stay an enjoyable one!

title: A wowzer experience
desc: It was splendid. I went with my family and I must say that the staff are very accommodating especial Suria who was giving us service at the Crystal club. Very kind and positive. Will likely go again if given the chance.

title: Grand Park City Hotel Staycay Wowza
desc: Suria provided excellent service at the Crystal Club Lounge! I enjoyed our stay here at Grand Park City Hotel. She made the best lattes and capuccinos. She was so accomodating and friendly. I took selfies with her too.

title: Compliment to Ms. Suria
desc: I am so delightful that she is very cheerful and professional. She is so kind and pro active to her job. She always checked what our needs or request. Very accomodating. Keep it up. I am happy customer here.

title: Compliment to Ms. Suria
desc: Ms. Suria is so accomodating and very friendly. She is very attentive to her job and attend to all our request on time. I am very pleased with her service. Definitely will come back again because of the food and service provided.

title: My stay
desc: it was a very interesting experience especially the blinds for the toilet üòÖ.it was very nice.The pool nice clear it was an honor hotel. Atikah Sufri Iwan Allysha Kher Xian.. they were helpful throughout my stay.

title: Review for Hotel Stay
desc: The stay was satisfying and worth it for my family! The staffs gave good service and were very helpful throughout our stay :) Good Job Allysha, Sufri, Atikah, Iwan, Kher Xian! We will definitely come back!

title: Real 5 Star Service
desc: Service is outstanding. The staff go out of their way to accommodate your questions. I would like to mention Suria, Iwan, and an older gentleman (luggage service) I‚Äôve interacted with. Thank you for showing my family what 5 star service really is from the moment we arrived.

title: Staycation
desc: Very nice and cozy hotel, the staffs very helpful especially miss.allysha at the receptionist. I give her a 5star for her service and mr.syahir for helping us with our bag. Definitely will come back next time. Great job guys.

title: Amazing!
desc: The jacuzzi room and the lounge is amazing. Thomas is great! The food and drinks are definitely worth keeping your belly for. Breakfast, high tea, and dinner is amazing. Definitely highly recommend!!!

title: Positive experience with hotel and hotel staff
desc: We had a fantastic stay! Hotel staff are friendly and very helpful. Communication was a breeze. We arrived early but we were able to check-in early! Thank you to Mayshell for the swift check-in. The room is beautiful and sooo comfortable! When we had trouble with roaming and booking a car back to the hotel, we were desperate enough to call the hotel reception and Cuma very kindly booked a Grab for us! Such a lifesaver after a whole day of walking around the city! Thomas at the Crystal Club was also very nice and cheerful! Will surely stay here again when we come back to Singapore for a visit!

title: Monthsary Dinner
desc: Picked this restaurant as it‚Äôs near my working place. I‚Äôve heard that it serves great steak. Came for the steak and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Ordered 2 steaks and the portion was huge. title: A memorable stay
desc: The room, crystal club and facilities are first rate. The staff were sensational and a special thanks to Kripa, Cardijn, Mayshell and Cuma for making our stay memorable. There are many other staff also but don‚Äôt know their names who made our visit comfortable. I highly recommend this hotel in Singapore.

title: Exelent visit to Singapore in GrandPark City Hall
desc: Wery friendly, comfortable, superclean. Extrmly good position. Easy to go in difrent intresting places. Very close to National ArtGalery, Museum of Asian Civilization, Parliament,THEATRE, close to ChinaTown, 100m To Hop on Hop off station. Friendly staff. Special remarke Ismail (Bellmen).

title: Impeccable.!
desc: A brilliant hotel and I had fantastic stay for 7 days. The service and care of the staff is impeccable. Central location to all the shops, local food markets and MRT Transport. A Special Thank you to the ground staff (bellmen) for always having a smile on their faces and being so helpful. Thank you ‚ÄúIsmail‚Äù

title: Amazing stay
desc: Sufri from guest service was very nice and helpful during our stay. The stay was wonderful, the hotel is situated in the middle of the city. We really enjoyed walking around the city and exploring Singapore. We were informed about all the details.

title: Superb service team
desc: We had a great experience from the time we checked-in until leaving the hotel. Tiffany assisted us during check-in with a smile and welcoming gestures. During our breakfast, the staffs in the restaurant was so helpful despite of the busy crowd, Indran & Mei Hua was very attentive on our needs (having a 3yo boy that is very active). Mayshell & Marnani at Crystal club are very accommodating and always cheerful which makes us feel warmth! It was a memorable experience with the staff‚Äôs impeccable service! We will certainly stay again!

title: Excellent ambience and service; will come again!
desc: A pleasant solo staycay with GPCH! Big thank you to the ones who assisted me throughout my stay, from the front desk to the ones who delivered my requests. A special mention to one of the Managers, Mr Sufri, who managed my check in (and answered any queries I had) - he was patient and friendly throughout; also to another lady at the front desk, Ms Allsya (I think, from what I found out from Mr Sufri) - thank you for assisting me with the HDMI request and for answering other queries I had. Room was really spacious, housekeeping did a great job with the room when I requested for housekeeping the next day. Tub was spacious and had a good view of the TV from it. Breakfast was decent - had quite a spread of food, and buffet style. Service was prompt (drinks were served by the

title: A great stay with lots of smiles!
desc: We had an amazing stay at the hotel on our short visit to Singapore. The room was very spacious and comfortable but the highlight of the stay were the staff - especially Sutri and Allysha who , with a smile, went above and beyond to look after our every need. They really made the stay very special. Of course the location is great. Can't recommend the hotel highly enough.

title: Excellent Service for Sufri & Allysha
desc: I had such a fantastic experience in The Grand Park City Hall hotel . I was attended by the Manager Mr Sufri and his assistant Miss Allysha . They both are super friendly and excellent service . Can‚Äôt express my gratefulness to both of them . They make me feel so welcome and special . Thank you so much .

title: Pleasant Customer Personnel Ms Suria

She go the distance to try to assist us and we wouldn‚Äôt know she is an intern if the other staff never inform us as she exude professionalism in every way when she is checking us in. Overall experience was great will definitely come back for a short stay.

title: Awesome stay..
desc: Sufri handled our check in. It was amazing check in experience. Hotel was complementary upgrade... Great room. Extremely spacious room and a unique wardrobe which opens into the room as well as opens into the toilet . The view from the window was looking out into the awesome Singapore Skyline. The in room services in the mini bar had a unique coffee sachet which was extremely good flavor.

title: Great hotel and nice surroundings
desc: Such a pleasant stay. The room is nice. The services are great. Shopping malls and park are nearby. The surroundings are not too crowded except for weekends. Transportations are also very close to the hotel.

title: Modern Hotel in a Superb Location

Booked a Deluxe Room but got it upgraded to Premier Room thanks to the professional assistance by counter staff Allysna. Bathtub is huge which is a plus as well and not forgetting a scrumptious breakfast! Thanks for the hospitality.

title: Great !
desc: Location and service excellent! Club room is worth it , specially service staff at club lounge Suna is wonderful, she was very thoughtful and considerate. Hotel is nicely located and decent. Breakfast was limited but good .

title: 5 star experience
desc: Wonderful experience and world class service, thanks Narien for making an enjoyable experience for my son's birthday staycation. Services by front desk was professional and friendly. Truely a very memorable experience for my family and I

title: Very pleasant experience
desc: Very conveniently located hotel with very friendly staff and lovely rooms. Worth paying a little extra to have club access. Chef Judy cooks up a real treat and both Sufri and Mayshell were incredibly helpful and friendly. Highly recommended

title: Best Singapore hotel
desc: Very amazing hospitality by the reception. Beautiful and comfy rooms. Will definitely come back here again for stays.
