Guest experience manager Sufri was definitely a great front desk experience before check in, totally made us feel comfortable the moment we arrived. I must say I‚Äôm impressed by Grand Park City Hall

title: Must stay in this hotel if you are in Singapore!!
desc: This has been an amazing my staycation I have had in a long time. The staff were accommodating and pleasant when I checked in. While I stayed here for 5 nights & I realised the management and their staff are always ready to take on whatever requests I may have. ‚ÄúYes!‚Äù Is what this hotel advocates to ensure that the guests‚Äô stay is pleasant throughout the entire trip. My room was upgraded by Sufri (from the reception) and when I mentioned I did not like to be located next to the lift, he changed my room immediately. No questions asked. AND ‚Ä¶ the staff at Crystal Club! All of them were super awesome! Thomas is super attentive to my needs during cocktails evenings, making sure I was well taken care during meals. Special shout out to Mandy, the housekeeper in charge of the

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel. Centrally located and fabulous and friendly staff. Especially in the lounge on the 9 floor. Swimming pool meets all requirements and the rooms are quiet and comfortable. Would definitely recommend this place.

title: Ms
desc: Gorgeous hotel in a great location and magnificent service especially Allysha who was very helpful. Will definitely stay again in this wonderful city. Looking forward to booking out next visit and enjoying our wonderful experience again.

title: A WONDERFUL 5 STAR HOTEL IN AN AMAZING LOCATION
desc: Me and my family stayed at Grand ~City Hall in Nov 2022. We cannot fault the hotel. The staff were excellent and very professional, the rooms were comfortable, well equipped and the bed was to die for. We ate breakfast every day and had one meal in the restaurant which we throughly enjoyed. For people who are looking for a luxury hotel in an amazing location , you cannot beat Grand City Hall. It is walking distance from the museums, very close to the metro, half way between little India and China Town. Everything is close and walking distance - including Marina Bay Hotel.

title: Loving the Crystal Club Lounge
desc: There is a decent variety of food and quality is great. Mayshell was the staff on duty, she had a warm personality. She welcomed us and made sure our needs are met. She also did an excellent job keeping the place presentable. Besides the food, the atmosphere was chill and relaxing. There weren‚Äôt a lot of people as well. It really settles the mind and calms the soul. Love the Xmas tree and the choice of Xmas music. PS: The photo don‚Äôt really show how nice it was. The small buffet spread in the photo was for afternoon tea.

title: Satisfactory
desc: Pleasant experience and stay. Apart from some minor issues such as aircon and collection of deposit. It's a great experience. Certainly would recommend to friends and family. Great location, service by room staffs and cleanliness.

title: Great Experience and Team
desc: After some flight cancellations and lost connections I was stranded in Singapore. I stayed a night at the Grand Park City Hall. Suria and Louis at the recpetion made my layover very comfortable. Bothbwere kind and patient despite me being overly tired from the journey. EXCELLENT and EFFICIENT SERVICE from both. Thanks so much

title: Large room, tasteful decor, outstanding customer service
desc: Stayed for 3 nights. The staff were very responsive online and on the phone, from booking until check out. Ms Atikah at the front desk made me feel well taken care of. The premiere room is huge and the decor is very tasteful, just perfect for a restful stay. Will definitely stay again.

title: Blissful and Fantastic Experience at Grand Park City Hall, Singapore
desc: I‚Äôve always chosen to stay at the Grand Park City Hall only for a reason, My home away from home. The hotel staff treat guests as family, they address you by name and remember your special requests. These are all the little things that matter! Front office team at the Reception, namely Atikah, Kripa, Cardjin, Jessica and Kripa welcome guests warmly and they addressed me by name and were very kind and respectful. The Front office team at the Crystal Club lounge namely, Kher Xian, Mayshell, Iwan and Melody and Ms Sanda treat us like royalty and very accommodating to all our requests. They also shared their experiences and gave us insight recommendations. They take the time to talk to us and we can feel the warmth. I‚Äôm just delighted to be here. The conceige team at the first

title: Perfect location coupled with incredible service
desc: The hotel location and and amenities are very competitive for it‚Äôs price point but what sets it apart is the customer service by the staff. Allysha who has attended to us since our first visit up until our last, always goes the extra mile to make sure our stay is comfortable and pleasant. Thank you, Allysha!

title: One of best staycay!
desc: I would like to thank Allysha for giving us a free upgrade to premier room with a tub!! Really appreciate it. I got a high floor with view and a complimentary cake and also a late check out. Everythingggg i could i ask for. Thank you!!!! My baby had a great stay! We had a great stay. Sadly we couldn‚Äôt go to the pool as it was raining the whole day. Would definitely come back again and highly recommend!!!!

title: Positive review
desc: Served by KRIPA , ATIKAH. Both welcomed us warmly and even gave us a free complimentary drink from the bar. Highly satisfied by their welcome. Thanks for the wonderful experience and highly recommended

title: Great Location busy hotel for international travellers
desc: October 2022 A pleasant upscale hotel in Singapore, at a reasonable distance from our convention centre. Ms Tiffany at the reception was most helpful in securing an early check in, as our flight was inbound several hours before the conventional time. I shall update the experience of our stay soon Update: My only update will be on two points. First, its wrong to ask people to write reviews even before they have checked in. An international hotel as this should not be dependent on reviews from incoming guests. i hope I was the only case where this happened. My second review is on the food. I understand the hotel is not as plush s some of the other places and they have a busy buffet breakfast going on for the size of the breakfast area they have. However, I would have liked the

title: Grand Park Hotel
desc: We were attended by Kripa & Allysha when we arrived for our check in. Upon checking in we were offered free drinks at the bar & a late check out. We were answered in detail regarding our questions & everyone was polite! Thank you Grand Park City Hall!

title: Good location good service
desc: The receptionist Allysha provide a very good service when checking into the hotel. She noticed that i have a young kid and offer us for early check in. Very nice of her. The room was clean and great view

title: First time stay, not so good impression
desc: First time to stay in this hotel. I booked 2 rooms for the 4 of us and already requested for a king bed and a twin bedroom from the beginning. The hotel gave us these requested rooms after we insisted but they refused to change the names on each room. My daughter and her husband are supposed to stay in the king bed and check out 1 day later after me and my friend. When I checked out first as scheduled, Front Desk Staff forced my daughter and her husband to move to our room which was a twin bed, even after I settled this issue with Front Desk Staff before I checked out and bills are settled already. We will certainly choose another hotels better than this as their rooms are fairly smaller in comparison to other 5-star hotels in Singapore.

title: Very good service
desc: My family was being served by Mayshell (Guest Service Executive). She is very friendly and my family felt welcome. Hotel is clean and comfy. Location is convenient too. Just few minutes walk from Cityhall MRT station. We enjoyed our stay. Will definitely visit again.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Service is great. Food is good. Personnel are friendly especially Ms Mayshell and Mr Sufri. My kids love the room. Very kids friendly. Swimming pool with child friendly facilities is preferred. Overall very satisfied.

title: Nice rooms that adopt technology initiatives
desc: Staffs are welcoming when we checked in for our rooms. We reached early in the morning at around 8am, as the the hotel rooms was quite full. The staff by the name of Ash, has gone the extra miles to help us check in few hours later. Thumbs up to the friendly staffs here.

title: Great staff with great service
desc: A very big welcome by the hotel staffs (Sufri, Ash, Kher Xian) at reception counter. Friendly and attentive to my queries. Room and pool is good. Location is great with walking distance to malls. Will be back to stay.

title: Highly recomended
desc: Affirm to the team of Ms. Jean lim..we had a wonderful experience .from front office staff ,f and b and housekeeping they are eager to help. Will recomend to family,friends and collegues .thank u glen mostazas,chris santos, rico and jaye for the special help. Appreciate u all guys.Godbles.

title: Wonderful Staycation Place
desc: Great amenities and service! Thank you for the wonderful service. We enjoyed our two days stay at the hotel. Would love to go back again next time! It was such a happening place and a good place to rest as well.

title: A great stay & helpful staff
desc: Was at Grandpark hotel and we had a good stay at this hotel. All staffs are super friendly and helpful. The cleaniness of the room is clean &spectacular Thank to Mr Sufri who give us more information about local food around this area.

title: Good front desk staff
desc: Went there for a business meeting. And Allysha answers all my queries with a smile knowing every single detail. Awesome üëå she is also very helpful in showing the way when I'm not sure of where the restaurant or venues are. Good job!

title: Good guest experience
desc: Sufri (Guest Experience Manager) was very attentive and listened to my requests which he accommodated to quickly and to my satisfaction. He is very professional and has a great personality making the stay very comfortable.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Great 2 nights staycation with my family. Fast check-in by reception sufri and we manage to upgrade our room to premier room with bathtub. Location is good, you can get food everywhere around the hotel . Thank to sufri for the great customer service.

title: Good location, bad experience
desc: I'm still baffled by the fact that this is billed as a five-star hotel. To me, it was more like a middling four star or a good three stars. Customer service left much to be desired. Location was good but it depends on what side of the hotel your room is in. I don't recommend this place.

title: Excellent
desc: This hotel does not disappoint. I have stayed here many time and upon returning back to Singapore after the 3 years, the hotel staff still remembered me and made me feel welcome. The rooms are well sized, clean and comfortable. Location is central to everything from sights to public transport. Will definitely stay here again when I return to Singapore.

title: Great Stay. Good Staff Service
desc: Hotel is at a good location near to MRT station, Shopping mall and Attractions. Very affordable, definitely value for money. Comfortable bed with nice design and layout in the room. Good service by front desk Sufri who assisted me with our stay. He is very patience to answer all my questions. Excellent Mr Sufri üëç Breakfast was ok for us and there is Outdoor Pool. We shall come again here soon.

title: Loved my stay, a memorable one!
desc: I had an enjoyable stay at this hotel! I was pretty occupied with a few meetings, and Suria, the lovely and cheerful lady at Crystal Club was very kind enough to help me with room service and the food recommended by her was exquisite! Loved the Margarita Pizza!! Please convey my gratitude to her, she made my stay a little less lonely. Would definitely come again. Ps. wishing her the best in her internship !! she‚Äôs splendid üòç

title: Very Good
desc: Very good hotel all around making my stay that much more pleasant. The location was very good near shopping mall and business district area making it ideal for business trips in Singapore. It's my second time staying at the hotel and will be coming back again.

title: Center of Singapore
desc: Nice hotel with a small but good breakfast and dining area. Quite central good to reach the bay by foot. Nice rooms and a nice pool, with gym around. Bar and Poolbar not staffed during my visit. Anyway I would come again.

title: Rooms are good and clean and staff are soooo nice!!!
desc: Cardijn was so nice! He assisted me in all of the things I needed to make my stay in Grand Park good. The facilities of this hotel is also great. Rooms are spacious and clean. The also give you welcome fruits, and they make sure to refill your teas, coffees and water bottle every day. Will definitely go back.

title: Comfortable
desc: Stayed for 6 days 5 nights, the room was clean and very comfortable. The staffs were extremely helpful and friendly. Breakfast was alright but it didn't matter because I'm always in a rush in the morning. Overall, good and will come back again. Thanks !

title: Slow or lacking service
desc: Nice pool. Nice rooms. Slow check-out. Slow stored luggage retrieving. No help to order cabs. Closed down lobby and other facilities for hotel guest due to wedding event, no warning/information was sent out.

title: Amazing Stay!
desc: I had an amazing Stay at the Grand Park City Hall. Loved the hotel & how centralised it was. Staff at every level were very accomodative & friendly, especially Sufri. Definitely my choice again on my next visit!

title: Quick getaway
desc: We just had a staycation at Grand Park, the ambience is very nice. It‚Äôs so cozy & comfortable. We had no complaints, it‚Äôs very relaxing. The person in charge named Sufri was very nice to us & staff are very friendly. Would definitely go for a stay again next time.

title: Allysha melody and staff
desc: We have had the best stay here, the room was beautiful and the staff were even better, so polite and accommodating, such a great erea too not far from all the sites, pool was lovely too, would definitely recommend to people. Thank you.

title: Wedding stay
desc: I had an amazing experience at Grandpark city hall. The staff were all incredibly friendly and helpful, and the facilities were great. I would like to specially mention Sufri (Guest experience manager) which made our stay all the more wonderful. I'd definitely recommend this hotel to anyone traveling through the area!

title: great Stay
desc: close to everything friendly staff in walking distance to the MRT and raffles plaza as well as Raffles to get your singapore sling taxi s always close by can walk to chinatown and to boggie street cheap eating close by

title: Practically no storage
desc: Hotel designer needs to be shot. Too many fancy ideas but a lack of thought for everyday things like drawers for cloths (shirts, underwear etc), no desk for a little work and silly light/heating controls - normal switches are so much easier and quicker, no bath robes, no luggage racks ( needed to ask for robes & racks). Hotel used by cruise guests before & after their trips so the main entrance looks like the left luggage office of a railway station and not a 5 star establishment. Room was on the small side (even without drawer units). Pool is small with little shade and appears that pre booking is required (why??? It's 5 star!!). Overall the entrance is no way large enough and needs to be remodelled (get a different designer). So quite disappointed. Checked in for 5 nights wish

title: Business visit but I had the time to tour the wonderful city
desc: Excellent stay. Room are spacious and clean. Easy access to the downtown. I made a reservation for a deluxe room but they granted an access to crystal lounge and this is the first time I have such a privilege. Outstandingly isolated rooms, no sound was heard all day and night. They have a sky garden on the top roof, highly recommended to visit and enjoy the food and drinks also the weather especially at night for the months from November till February. Servers at the Crystal lounge are very elegant and has high self esteem and very helpful. Special thanks to Kripa for super service.

title: Great Experience!
desc: Excellent front desk experience. Clean room and every staff especially Mr Sufri is courteous, helpful and accommodating. And it was a good location for the things i had planned. Great stay but just wish the price were a little lower. Will definitely be staying here again.

title: Hits in some areas, frustrations in others.
desc: I stayed for nearly 2 weeks in this hotel and overall, the stay was pleasant. The Deluxe room was neat and clean and the shower had good pressure and came with the usual toiletries, The only thing missing was body lotion. The room I had faced the alley and looked directly into the offices at the Peninsular Plaza across. Still, the room manages to be well-lit during the day without being too gloomy. The bed was very comfortable, and so were the pillows. Given their sustainability efforts, housekeeping does not clean the room daily. Instead, they will clean once during my stay. Any additional requests for housekeeping services will cost $30. As I am relatively neat, I did not mind that so much. A problem I had was the bath towels in my room do not seem to dry and stayed

title: short but sweet
desc: A short trip punctuated but the restful stay in this hotel -- clean, great location, reasonably priced and friendly staff. The experience started with warm welcome despite the early hour and ended with very accommodating staff despite the inconvenient time.

title: Great stay!
desc: From arrival to departure, the service are great. Staffs are presented themselves with knowledge and professionalism. Room is clean and bed are comfortable! Everything is great in the room except there is no bidet. The location is near Funan and Peninsula Plaza. The nearest train station is at City Hall with around 5-10mins walk.

title: Good location and friendly staffs.
desc: Close to MRT stations and shopping centres. Many eateries in surrounding. Breakfast was really good and didn't have to wait too long. Parking also available if you are driving there. Fort Canning Park is another nearby place for visitors to relax.

title: Staycation at Grand Park City Hall
desc: The overall stay at Grand Park City Hall was a pleasant one. Approachable and friendly staff. Fuss-free and pleasant arrival check in and departure check out. Centralised location with shopping malls and many eateries nearby. Love the hotel decor and the vibes!

title: Great Experience with the hotel
desc: The services are good, hotel services crews are all awesome. Despite my business trip kind of being ruined because of Covid 19, but the trip has become less suffering because they have been very helpful and supportive.

title: Hotel overwhelmed at full occupancy
desc: This hotel, as much as I wanted to like it, was not adequately staffed to handle the number of guests that descended upon Singapore, and this hotel in particular, for the f1 weekend. You had to choose your meal times carefully to avoid the crowds. I arrived after the nominated check in time and observed several demanding guests testing the patience of the obviously-stretched front desk staff. I was offered the opportunity to wait in the club lounge until my room was available, and appreciated it. I found the room spacious, and the air con VERY efficient, but the lighting technology incredibly frustrating - it took (what felt like) 35 clicks to turn off the lights at night. Not great when you simply wanted to go to sleep, exhausted after a long day! An in room guide, or an ‚Äúall

title: Too much automation‚Ä¶ front desk can do bettee
desc: Too much automation‚Ä¶ lights ac and fan connected thru single console near bed it is very frustrating‚Ä¶. Also got a free downgrade that was annoying‚Ä¶ I also dislike that they nickel and dime customers for early checkin‚Ä¶

title: A so-called high tech 5 star hotel with poor service
desc: They put some so-called high tech control in the room and their APP, I was attracted as an IT person. In reality, the APP not working . The room controller is not user friendly and lack of intruction. I had to try hard to bend my knees to reach the iphone-size controller fixed in the wall, in a very small corner, everyday and night, when I want to adjust anything inside the room. (Yes there are no light switch on the wall at all!) . Other side, the service is generally poor in many sides. Will not come back for sure.

title: Clean and excellent location
desc: My visit was for Expo and Conference at MBS and hotel location is excellent. next to Funan and Peninsula shopping malls, walking distance to Coffeebean and McDonalds.City Hall MRT is 5min walking distance.

title: Felt like good value for money; great staff.
desc: The only negative thing I can really say about this hotel is that some parts of the building and our room were slightly shabby and could‚Äôve done with a refurb. We also got an email about online check-in requesting a deposit of around ¬£900; we queried this on arrival and ended up paying a ¬£300 deposit which was quickly returned after our three-night stay. Other than that, it‚Äôs all good! Staff were uniformly friendly and helpful. Our bed was very comfortable. Breakfasts were filling and tasty. We booked a rooftop barbecue on our last night which was very nice and felt special. We also used the rooftop pool on our last morning and it was very pleasant. On checking out, it was no problem to leave our bags for several hours, and we also got a room (for free) to get showers before our

title: Pleasant stay
desc: First time here and was a pleasant stay staff was attentive and room was of a nice size. I like the location with many shopping and eating options. Walking distance to the city hall MRT station is a plus as cabs are hard to get in SG

title: Technically a 5 star hotel...by feeling 3,5 star
desc: One of my greatest mistake by a hotel booking. We stayed 7 days in this hotel and I was counting each day down to leave! We payed 280 USD per night. Never got so less than in this hotel. For sure in Singapore you pay for the space and the location. The room was fine, but we had technical issues with the TV, sometimes you were able to control and sometimes not, the safety box was running out of battery and the reception was telling me. go outside and we will fix it. Really? what do you think, i will not supervise, when a safety box will be fixed? Check my review, how the hilton in istanbul was handling this. WIFI is slow, but for additional bugs you can have faster one. Sorry, these days you have not to pay extra for good internet. For good cleaning you should choose the better

title: ordinary experience, good location
desc: The location is solid but the rooms are very small and don't have a desk to work at if you are going for work. the room service is also extremely poor for the price and I couldn't recommend it for any type of travel.

title: Very Good
desc: posizione eccellente per poter visitare tutta Singapore a piedi, vicino ai musei e alla baia. Nice and clean rooms. Breakfast good and just ask for more things like pancakes, omelettes etc. Courteous and efficient staff

title: I love this hotel
desc: This is our second visit to the hotel but first since covid so we weren‚Äôt sure what to expect. Our room wasn‚Äôt ready when we arrived so we were taken into the club lounge for a cool drink. Kripa looked after us there and after 30 mins chased our room key for us so we could unpack. Our room was nice and our cases were there ready and waiting. It was so lovely to see so many friendly faces from our previous stay including the breakfast chef Judy (she‚Äôs AMAAAAAZING. I love her) who remembered us from before. Always letting us know what the food selection was and made sure we had a cooked breakfast before we left for the day During our stay Kripa was so lovely. Giving us recommendations on where to go and what to see, always made conversation with all the guests (even the rude

title: Excellent service
desc: Hotal staff was friendly, room was cleaned there was entertainment in the room to keep you entertain such as smart lights control, blinds and Jbl speakers to link up you hp best of all is the windows bay area that allows you to relax with a cup of coffee.

title: Singapore!!!
desc: Huge thanks to all the staff at grand park cityhall..All the staff were great..from the 1st floor Balan to the Club and service there was exceptional.What do i say Marnani at breakfast and kripa in the evening was great who gave us tips on where to go during our stay..

title: Mesmerized by this Hotel
desc: What can I say about the overall beauty of this hotel. My family and I stayed in this hotel for how many days and we all enjoyed and loved it and we are planning to go back! Foods, amenities, rooms and staffs are all amazing! Special thanks to Mikaela, Ismail, Mayshell and Kripa for all the assistance and happy faces you have shown us. God bless all üòá

title: Superb Hotel Experience
desc: It was my first time in Singapore and it is memorable experience to stay in Grand Park City Hall, the staffs are very accommodating and the hotel is kids friendly, my grandchildren had fun on the tent and did coloring activities during our stay. Kudos to the pretty and very friendly Guest Services Manager Ms. Mikaela! Thank you for making our stay extra special. Thank you also to Ms. Mayshell on a smooth transaction upon arrival to hotel, thanks as well to Ms. Kripa for entertaining us with serving us with delightful treats. Thank you Ismail for your warm welcome. Hotel is highly recommended!

title: Highly recommended place to stay
desc: This is a must try place to stay with your family especially if you have a kids. I and my family experience a great service and an accommodating staff. A kid friendly environment, delicious foods to eat, rooms are very comfy ambiance and well instructed place/ rooms or amenities to go. Special thanks to Mikaela, Kripa, Mayshell and Ismael for the warmth welcome and assistance. Your smile, happiness & kindness made our day brighter while staying in your hotel. We will surely come back and stay longer! God bless!

title: Great location, lovely rooms.
desc: I had a fantastic stay here on a little solo holiday - all the staff were lovely, particularly Ismail who was on the door downstairs. Great location, really nice pool for relaxing next to and close to heaps of public transport.

title: Great stay
desc: it was great staycation ! Staff Kirpa & Ash who checked us in was very helpful and friendly :-) the room was not ready as we arrived early they directed us to the lounge . Where we were welcomed by friendly Staff Kher Xian who was so welcoming, he was also took care of us for the evening cocktails. Breakfast buffet was quite a big variety, staff Marnani and Chef Judy were so friendly they made a point to come table to table to check on the guests and if everything was ok. Staff Mikela was so kind to accommodate our late check out all the staff extremely accommodating. room exceeded expectations and i really enjoyed my stay!

title: Highly recommend
desc: We spent 5 nights in the Oasis Junior Suite and can not fault the room or amenities . As part of out Suite you have your own private garden and jacuzzi we enjoyed several times daily, followed by steam shower Also as a benefit to the Suite you can enjoy the lovely Crystal Club where the most awesome staff make you feel relaxed and welcome. Our sincere thanks go to fabulous staff Kripa, Gianni and the wonderful chef Judy for the most awesome green curry, fried rice and not to mention the Eggs Benedict. I truly can not fault the hospitality. The reception Staff are absolutely wonderful and extremely helpful. A special thank you goes to the Lovely Aini, Guest Service Manager. Your smile and humour we will always remember. Grand Park City Hall, your staff are a credit to your

title: Awesome service and room
desc: This is My first stay with Grand Park City Hall. The room and amenities was great and service provided by Ms Kripa from reception during our stay made it convenient and pleasant stay for us. Mr David from resturant was very helpful with suggestion on food and we loved it.

title: Bad management of flooded floor for affected guests, zero sound proof walls
desc: My floor was flooded. I returned around 10.30pm. Had to walk through flooded corridor to reach my room. Vacuuming of water was in progress and really loud. Walls in hotel are very thin. Every conversation can already be heard very clearly. The staff are having very loud conversations to deal with flood situation. I called to ask if they can allow me to move room. Had a very unpleasant call. Told no rooms were available. Guest service manager would call back. No return calls. Baby crying could be heard from two to three rooms away. Light sleeper traveling for work, avoid this hotel at all cost.

title: Good for long stay in Singapore
desc: Spent in this hotel over two weeks: the location is superb, rooms very interestingly decorated and the staff is friendly. Appreciate breakfasts (very good selection of options and quality coffee, not the usual hotel cat p*ss). Good cleaners and very pleasant swimming pool. What I did not like: overpriced laundry (very overpriced) and quite number of pool parties, preventing me from use of the pool.

title: Grand Park City Hotel
desc: Very nice stay. Pity reception not on ground floor upon arrival after a long trip. Room kept clean on daily basis as you‚Äôd expect. Good location. Central to the city. Service was excellent throughout my stay.

title: Very satisfied!
desc: The room is clean and tidied. The room design is definitely what I‚Äôm looking for. It is very comfortable and cosy. Allysha is very friendly when helping me to check in. üòÑ definitely will come back for a longer stay

title: definitely cant complain
desc: great looking rooms, great and helpful service, location very close to mall and activities like clark quay. marina bay is like a 10-15 minute walk away. for all of these things you definitely do not need to get a taxi.

title: Nice Hotel with Nice staff
desc: I can say that this hotel is one of the best here in SG, the room was so nice and the service of the staff was excellence. I will surely recommend it to all my friends planning to visit Singapore. Thanks to all staff who serve us especially to mikaela.

title: Mr Zaini Baba
desc: I would like to say a special thank you to all your staff for the quality of stay and excellent service provided for myself, as well as for my Mum. Not only was our room very nice and well presented, your housekeeping made sure to look after us in such a caring manner. Our room was very clean, comfortable and well equipped for my mother‚Äôs medical needs. We felt very looked after. We are especially grateful for the fast and professional service provided by your staff during a very difficult emergency situation with my mother. Words cannot express how much we appreciated the help from your hotel staff, particularly by Faisal, Hata and Bryan. Their quick action may have helped save my mother‚Äôs life and we will forever be thankful for their help! Overall, I would give your hotel

title: Staycation
desc: Came for the 2nd time and the service was consistent throughout. Had trouble with the switches and staff was super efficient at troubleshooting it straightaway. Upon checking out, I forgot my mobile phone in the room, one of the staff, Allysha helped me to retrieve my phone back. Overall, i am satisfied with my stay

title: Good hotel and service with comfy bed
desc: Got a corner suite room and there was a nice little private corner. Good view . Also beds were comfortable and the addition of a ceiling fan made sure that it didn't fit too hot during the night. Service at the crystal club was excellent. Krupa and Gianni were both very helpful and provided exceptional and personalised service , they were very helpful and attentive and were even nice enough to make small talk. breakfast had chicken wings , which was nice

title: Superb VIP Experience
desc: This hotel is highly recommended, upon entrance of the hotel staffs will greet you with a sincerest smile, service üíØsatisfied, was moved by the personalised greetings by Ms. Mikaela Tarun (Guests Services Manager) to welcome our family, it was my family‚Äôs first time in Singapore and the experience we had is superb. Would like to commend Ms. Mikaela and her staffs namely Prika, Jessica, Mayshell, Ismail, Narein & Gianni on making our stay extra special. The hotel is kids friendly as well Thank you so much & more power to Grand Park City Hall. Will surely come back & recommend with our family & friends‚Ä¶

title: Great hotel good location
desc: We stayed here at the beginning of August for 4 nights in Crystal club rooms . The hotel is incredibly clean and well furnished and in a great location for sightseeing. The swimming pool area was great to chill around. Our room was very comfortable and had everything we needed . We had breakfast in the Crystal club lounge , where we looked after by lovely staff , the food on offer was great with plenty options , the omelettes were very tasty. In the evenings after sight seeing we visited the lounge for cocktails and to enjoy the buffet food., it was different food every night . The lounge offered outside space with great views a good place for us to enjoy our sundowners. Thanks to all the staff that made our stay very enjoyable but an extra special thanks to Thomas from the

title: Awesome visit with great service!
desc: We just checked in today and met Judy and Kripa. Both of them are very hospitable and made our stay super enjoyable. I‚Äôm glad that me and my partner decided to celebrate an eventful day in Grand Park City Hall. Kripa made our check in very fuss free and even allow us to grab some afternoon tea while she checks in for us. Made us feel very at home and welcomed. The coincidence whereby Judy made non-seafood food during the evening cocktail made my partner very happy. My partner is allergic to seafood which we did not disclose to the hotel as we will just avoid if there is any. We will definitely visit again in future ü´∂‚ú®

title: Great place to stay in Singapore
desc: Beautifully refurbished hotel. Comfiest beds. Staff in the Crystal Lounge are very friendly, generous and professional. The food is delicious. Nothing was too much trouble. The hotel's position makes it easy to access the MRT, Raffles and shopping malls are just around the corner.

title: Enjoyable Weekend Staycation
desc: My friends and I booked weekend staycation for a short getaway. Many thanks to the Front Office Team (Tiffany, Aini & Mikaela) for fulfilling our request for connecting rooms. Breakfast was served at Level 3. Despite the busy breakfast timing, restaurant manager, Indran, did an excellent job ensuring that all customers are satisfy with the food and drinks. The Swimming Pool, Gym & mini cafe are located at Level 4. Well maintained gym and swimming pool, a good venue to spend the afternoon and tea break. The Roof Garden is located on Level 11. There is also a bar serving food and alcohol/drinks. The night view is amazing, an ideal venue viewing for Fireworks Display.

title: Wonderful hotel with wonderful staff
desc: Very sorry for the late review, was held up with work. I was in this hotel 2 weeks ago for business meeting. I had a wonderful and amazing stay for that 4days.Once i arrive at the hotel i was checked in by Sashikumar and he was amazing at his job. Check in process was very smooth and i was so happy that he speaks tamil.I miss talking to ppl in tamil language as i have settled down in Aussie more then 10 years. Also i was craving for nice indian food and i asked him where to get a good indian food. He suggested few shop and ask me to download foodpanda. I wasn't so familiar with the app and i called him if he can help me set up the app .He offered to buy for me as its getting late and he afraid the shop will close .He paid with his card and i pass him cash. Such a lovely

title: Weekend Staycation
desc: My friend and I booked weekend staycation for a get together. The hotel was very accommodating to give us a connecting room as requested. Special thanks to front desk staff Tiffany Aini Mikaela for giving us suggestion to have breakfast in the hotel. We meet Indran, the restaurant manager, at the morning breakfast. The server fresh make the cappuccino and omelette üòã. A great breakfast to start a great day. Swimming facilities and gym equipment was good too. The night scenery at the top floor is a million dollar. Something to consider for national day fireworks.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Went to the hotel and have the best experience. Meet Allysha as the host. She has excellent service for greeting the guest. Will be back for sure! Its very great location to stay having shopping mall around the hotel.

title: Good for short term work trip
desc: Stayed for work and chose it for the closeness to work, the main part of Singapore and the pool! Pool is lovely and so are the staff. Location is also great! Super easy to get anywhere whether taxi, bus or MRT. But don't expect all the 5-star trimmings - it's a more basic 5-star hotel.

title: great location, helpful staff
desc: I want to thank the staff for the amazing service and accommodation. We both really enjoyed our stay here. The location was excellent and the staff were absolutely lovely, especially ismail and xue. Nothing was too much trouble and we appreciated the warm welcoming environment they have created here. They should be very proud of your hotel and the level of service they provide.

title: Good location hotel
desc: Location is good with poor view. Room facilities condition is quite OK but a refrigerator doesn't work at all and water pressure is very very weak. Not able to turn-off light in bed. However, people is kind and good.

title: Conveniently located
desc: Good stay with very convenient location at city hall. Rooms were clean and tidy. Reception is located on level 3. Friendly staff. Arranged for packed breakfast as i had early morning checkout Overall good stay. Only improvement loint: Breakfast options can be better.

title: Excellent Service
desc: We would like to commend the staff Balan,Kripa,Gianni,Lornie and Ismail for their kindest and sharp attention to detailsü•∞We had such a good time at this excellent hotelü•∞ü•∞Very highly recommend staying here ü•∞We're coming back to stay again soonü•∞ü•∞

title: 2D1N Premier King room
desc: Poor room service despite multiple request for utensils and ice bucket, it was not delivered. Location near Funan and Capitol building, food options are plenty. Bathtub was nice, pool was rather small.

title: grand park city hall is good for location and food place.easy access to town n cbd place.well recommed.great new hotel.
desc: great place to stay for family n friend..easy access to place like cbd n city.easy to find good food near the place.one of great new hotel brand new.well recomend.price is good n the place is clean.overall good.

title: Not suitable for family
desc: Room arrangements too dense and small walkway. Kitchen operating time limited. Lobby and waiting area small. Parking and lift to lobby small and unfriendly. Overall compensated due to very clean and modern

title: Great staycation with the family!
desc: The staff was really friendly and welcoming. Had a free upgrade as it was our first stay which was a nice surprise. Overall experience was good and service was efficient. Would be staying here again soon!

title: Staycation
desc: Staying for a night on 29 July 22, The room I had was great!, I had Breakfast and afternoon tea at Crystal Lounge, was Fabulous! Really make my stay a memorable of my life. Big thanks to Mikaela, Cardin, Ashikin, chef Judy, Renee, Thomas and Tracy for wonderful service, Food was amazing. I love it!!! Definitely will be back!!

title: Birthday!!!
desc: Once I‚Äôm arrived Mikaela greet me and lead me to the amazing room. I love all the arrangement !!! To Cardin thank you so much having me at Crystal Lounge, the staff are amazing, Ashikin and Chef Judy absolutely friendly and made my friend bday a memorable.

title: Lost and Found Item at Room 434
desc: To the General Manager, I would like to say a big " Thank you" to the housekeeper room 434 for keeping my auntie birthday gift. We were celebrating her birthday on the 26th July 2022 and she forgot to bring back home upon check out. And thanks to Suzanne Collins for the prompt follow up. She is very professional and very friendly. We will come back again to this hotel. Keep up the great service !

title: Clean and Cosy Room
desc: A very comfortable king bed with beautiful linen and thick pillows. The room is very clean, architecture and furniture perfectly created "step back in time". Bathroom had open and close automated privacy screen, standalone bath tub marble stone and tiles through out and a great idea to include makeup mirror lighting. Thanks to front desk Kripa and Mikaela. :)

title: It was a wonderful experience!
desc: It was a wonderful experience from the start of registration until the departure of hotel. The front desk was very kind to us by allocating a room near to the lounge. It was very convenient for us as the kids can find us easily in the lounge while we are having afternoon tea and breakfast. The staff in the lounge has also provided very good services while we are having afternoon tea, cocktail and breakfast. Lastly, while we depart the hotel, my wife had misplace her laptop in the hotel room. The hotel had made an effort to search for it and progressively update on the status by making a few call. They had also make an effort to leave it on level 1 service desk to make it less hassle free for us to collect the laptop. Thank you so much. If there is chance, we will come back

title: Great stopover
desc: We booked a crystal club room for a 5 night stopover between the UK and New Zealand. The rooms were comfortable, however the advanced technology that the hotel provides to manage the in-room experience verges on annoying, as it didn‚Äôt function properly and was overly complex. The Club lounge, whilst a bit on the small side, more than made up for the average room experience as the staff were fantastic. Kripa, Thomas, Ash, Kher and Xian were extremely attentive and exceeded our expectations. A special mention must go to Judy, the chef, who went above and beyond to cater for my wife‚Äôs dietary requirements, she was an absolute delight to talk to and passionate about her craft.

title: Was a nice stay in Singapore!
desc: The room, amenities, service were all great. Room was clean and modern, well maintained furniture. We also appreciate the good breakfast and the staff who were patient and so courteous in handling the breakfast crowd. One thing to improve is probably the sound-proofing between rooms, we could hear the doors opening/closing next door. Overall a reasonably priced stay, worth for the money :)

title: Great Hotel
desc: I The location was accessible to nearby places I want to explore. The hotel is in front of FUNAN a big shopping complex that has a food hall which sells great selection of Asian and western cuisines. It is very near the train station and many buses to chose from. The hotel has a nice swimming pool. Overall, the service provided from the reception staff, dining room staff and housekeeping staff were great. I will surely stay in this hotel again when I visit Singapore. Thomas & Kripa served me very well

title: Worst Breakfast Experience in the Far East
desc: We stayed here on the last leg of a tour that included Bangkok and Koh Samui. For some reason we were diverted to the ninth floor Crystal Lounge for breakfast where we had to queue in a corridor for 35 minutes. When we eventually got in the choice of breakfast items iwas worst than a Premier Inn with no options of eggs except boiled and the only cereals on offer being cornflakes. When we sat down we had to ask for the table to be cleaned. No-one offered us a hot drink and when we did get some attention they forgot to bring my coffee. Extremely disappointed. Will be asking for a refund for breakfast as I‚Äôd get better service at McDonalds!

title: Great Property
desc: Stayed here on a short transit. Reception team was polite and professional. Room was spacious and I liked the functionality of the design. The only area of improvement is the breakfast. The dining area is small and naturally seating is limited. Prepare to queue during busy hours. Overall a good stay

title: Best place to stay
desc: I stayed in the Grand Park Hotel for 19 days and the best decision I made when I was looking to stay in Singapore. The location was accessible to nearby places I want to explore. The hotel is in front of FUNAN a big shopping complex that has a food hall which sells great selection of Asian and western cuisines. It is very near the train station and many buses to chose from. The hotel has a nice swimming pool. Overall, the service provided from the reception staff, dining room staff and housekeeping staff were great. I will surely stay in this hotel again when I visit Singapore.

title: Best place
desc: I stayed in the Grand Park City Hall for 4 nights. Unfortunately I couldn‚Äòt stay longer. I appreciated everything in this hotel. Furthermore the location is perfect, at least from my point of view. You can reach almost any relevant place by walking around. As I stayed in a room with Club access I have to highlight the incredible service offered by Kripa, Judy, Kher Xian and other colleagues there. It was a real pleasure using their facilities in the club, the food and drinks as well. Due to my late flight in the evening I could enjoy a late checkout as well as a further stay in the beautiful Club- Lounge until I had to leave late afternoon. For me it was a perfect stay.

title: Great short stay
desc: The hotel is lovely and our first visit to Singapore we stayed in the club rooms for 4 nights the staff were exceptional we would like to thank Kripa and Ash for there wonder service and also Judy the Chef for excellent food we will definitely be visiting them again soon

title: Great service
desc: Hotel was extremely pleasant and flexible regarding rebooking due to COvid-19. Also the general service level is very high. Complemented with the great location we enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend the hotel

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: Top notch service, thank you Kripa and Thomas for making out stay so enjoyable. Very kid friendly experience for us. Pool area is nice and we really enjoyed the evening cocktails. Very good location, thanks

title: Great location with nice room.
desc: Love Grand Park City Hall. Close to MRT, shopping malls and even Fort Canning. Great location!. Very nice, clean room with adequate amenities. Internet connection is good too. Would love to come back in the future.

title: 1 night stay
desc: Room smells musky. Thankfully there‚Äôs a ceiling fan. The windows and exterior require maintenance as the windows were not clear. Some parts of the rooms were also dusty and the fridge was not cold. However, the early check-in and check-out was prompt and the staff were friendly right from the concierge. Appreciate the fruits provided and the welcome card.

title: Grand Park City Hall
desc: Great service and good location. Staff were attentive to the needs of the guests. Very advance in technology for the usage of the room with accessible app downloaded from smartphone. Would definitely recommend others to try out the hotel.

title: Strategic location. Poor Front Desk Service
desc: Nice room, Nice location, stay with family for 11 nights. Had bad experience with aircon and cleaning service room. Front Desk named Kripa was poorly help to solve problem and speaking rudely to guest.

title: Stay 10 June 2022
desc: The room was clean. The furniture was also orderly arranged, The digital remote control of lightings and aircons were fixed on the wall. There is a sense of convenience and it's high tech. Bath room and toilet were cleaned. The arrangement of the stuff there were well done. It was spacious and the study table was big enough for 2 person. Sofa was comfortable. Overall, the room was very impressive. Well done.

title: A heartwarming staycation
desc: Stayed at Grand Park City Hall for 3D2N and we were welcomed by friendly and professional staff. Checked in was a breeze! On the first night, due to insufficient beds, we requested for an extra bed however due to the size of the room, and extra bed was impossible. Therefore Miss Tiffany Chen the Assistant Front Office Manager suggested an upgrade to our room. We also had a casual talk about my elder son is having his PSLE exam this year. We didn't put it to heart and after a day of enjoyment outside, we were surprised to see a fruit tray with an encouragement card in our room! Ms Tiffany had written a card for my son to wish him all the best in his exams! We didn't think that Ms Tiffany remembered our small conversation! We were totally touched! First class customer

title: Impeccable service
desc: Good location. Hotel staff are all very professional. Enjoy their breakfast semi buffet. Yummy and delicious. Afternoon tea set was also very nice. Servicing staff are all patient and attentive. Enjoy their junior suite room with nice ceiling fan. spacious bathroom that comes with steam bath. The toiletry are plant based too.

title: Worst hotel ever..
desc: They gave us pork breakfast even though we specifically asked not to, and didn‚Äôt even make a new one, we had to pay for it. House keeping didn‚Äôt clean the toilet during our stay, not even once. And always forgot to give the towels. The in room control app is horrible.

title: A hotel with human touch.
desc: Stayed Grand Park City Hall for 3D2N and we were welcomed by friendly and professional staff. Check in was a breeze! On the first night, due to insufficient beds, we requested for an extra bed. Due to the size of the room, an extra bed was impossible to be added. Therefore Ms Tiffany Chen the Assistant Front Office Manager suggested an upgrade to our room. We also had a casual talk about our elder son is having his PSLE this year. We didn‚Äôt put it to heart and we had a pleasant surprise! We found a fruit tray with an encouragement card for my son who placed in our room! Ms Tiffany had written a card for my son to to wish him good luck in his PSLE! We didn‚Äôt think that Ms Tiffany remembered our simple conversation and sent us a fruit tray accompanied with an encouragement card!

title: Terrible service
desc: Atrocious service at this hotel. If you don‚Äôt mind being insulted or have a bad time, you can consider this place for its good location and average cleanliness. Even suiteroom have a weird layout that I got dizzy watching the wall tv as it was from a weird angle. I will never come back again even if it was free.

title: A great location
desc: A clean and very comfortable hotel, with friendly, professional staff. It is well located, a short distance from an MRT station on both the red and green lines and close to a number of great food halls and other shops. Very central.

title: 3D2N staycay
desc: Service was really great throughout the stay. The staff were very welcoming and friendly. Only issue was with the room. Maybe it was due to covid or whatnot, but it felt like the room was not well-maintained. My boyfriend and I were lucky and grateful to be upgraded to the junior garden suite. However, the balcony was quite dusty and dirty (cigarette butts from previous guest not cleared), hence, we did not really get to enjoy it. The cups were also oily, despite several washes. It was overall a pleasant stay regardless, but coming from a 4/5 star hotel, we definitely have expected better, and it would be a better stay with greater cleanliness and maintenance of the room.

title: A great stay
desc: Took advantage of the central location to walk to dinner, check out a couple galleries, and have drinks. It was great. Service top notch as always. Bed comfort can not be beat. Will definitely come again.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: I had a birthday staycation at Grand park city hall and Vicky gave us a free upgrade! She was very nice and friendly with the check in process. Thank you so much for letting me have a wonderful birthday ü•≥

title: March stay
desc: I stayed for two months in the hotel where I noticed It could be way cleaner, mainly the group used areas like the gym, lobby and elevators. The hotel was quiet and the internet was good. Not much complains aside from the cleaniliness

title: Highly recommended - Good and Bad - Roller coaster of Emotions
desc: Overall stay is good with early check out available during our stay. Kudos to one of Filipina staff at the reception for giving us the reasons to enjoy our stay with her positive and pleasant attitude. Tho, we also had a bad experience with one of the Filipino hotel restaurant manager during our stay because of his criticism and bad judgment of us. But our overall experience with this hotel is memorable and fun. We enjoyed every hour and every minute of our stay here at this hotel.

title: Hotel for my Business Trip Stay
desc: Good place since it is a new hotel (i think?) the room is cozy but not too large but its ok. staff front desk is friendly, but the staff in the breakfast area is not really good. Hotel is near City Hall MRT Station, near Funan Mall, and Raffles City, however, in the night, many people are likely to sit on the street and have a drink, please be more thoughful if you traveling alone at night (especially girls).

title: The service was amazing kripa our receptionist was amazing
desc: Our stay at grand park city hall was wonderful. The service was amazing, Our receptionist Kripa was helpful and kind, all in all, it was a memorable stay and would love to visit Singapore and stay at the grand park city hall again

title: Great Location but could be better
desc: location is great as it is beside funan. Room has smart control panel on the wall. aircon was not really strong even though it was maxed out - had to turn on the fan at 80% speed. pool was not that big as compared to photos but sufficient for 25m lap swim. didnt manage to eat breakfast despite opting and willing to pay as staff mentioned restaurant gets full quickly and might not get seats desired. you can get breakfast at raffles city mall or funan, which is ok.

title: A good first time with Grand Park City hall!
desc: I bounced upon a hotel advertisement and was attracted by the outdoor jacuzzi at Grand Park City Hall. I decided to make a booking and stayed over last weekend. It was a good experience and the jacuzzi was a bonus with the spacious room set up and the big bathroom. A very pleasant surprise for my birthday and thank you to the hotel team who did the set up! We will be back once again! Thank you Grand Park City Hall!

title: Good
desc: Everything in the whole booking was good. Furniture was nice, and toilet was big and confortable. Just hope the reception waiting time could be better. There were 2 receptionists, but both were. We were initially told we don't have a double bed which we ordered, only 2 single, but she managed to get 1 for us

title: Great hotel
desc: A very nice design clean and great location hotel. Good sound proofing rooms too. Bed is rather too firm for my preference. Service is great. Nothing to complain about. D Hotel definitely did a wonderful renovation

title: An Awesome staycay with amazing staff
desc: Recently booked my staycay at Grand park its awesome how the staff especially nickiy / melody they were awesome . Really fast and quick check in dont have to wait too long not like other hotels check in and will definitely go back again! Super convenient because its a 2 - 5mins walk to funan mall . I want to go back again really big shout out to the staff . I love the room as well its awesome it is easy to use and control with the smart switch in the room :D !!! Thank you so much!!

title: Staycation
desc: Overall a pleasant stay, but rooms could do with more amenities. Breakfast options were the same every morning, and not that many choices and range, so quite disappointing. Wireless charger at bedside table and some USB slots were not working. Refrigerator was spacious enough for our use, but didn't seem cold enough.

title: Not clean hotel
desc: There were blood stains on the toilet floor and also the shower head. Dust all over the room and the box to keep the toothbrush had little creatures climbing on it. The hotel should work on cleaning the room clean. Room service was bad had to call thrice before they deliver the items and the items delivered were wrong too.

title: Great location, comfortable beds!
desc: The hotel is in a great location, being close to the Funan Centre, also Raffles City Complex & City Hall MRT station. If staying more than 3 - 4 days check your reservation isn‚Äôt limited to just one clean per week !

title: Staycation at Grand Park City Hall
desc: A short stay to recharge....surprise by the meals that's included in the hotel stay! Overall, the room was nice and clean. We were able to check in at 130pm as recommended by the hotel. Just a little disappointed that the Club Lounge at Level 9 was closed.

title: Great customer service
desc: Greeted by friendly staff. We arrived at the hotel earlier than expected and left our bags with the concierge. Very welcoming! Check-in staff Kripa, Vickiy was very helpful during the entire check in process and greeted us with smiles throughout. Hotel check-in was seamless and smooth despite during the long PH holiday. Will definitely recommend to families and couples! And great location too! Just next to Funan and walking distance from Raffles City, The Central!

title: Grand Park - excellent hotel
desc: Excellent hotel, very clean, great location that is close to MRT, shopping and food. Great service staff and had a wonderful experience during month long stay with my family. Concierge and housekeeping staff are most helpful.

title: Pleasant stay and very friendly staffs here!
desc: 2 days stay in this hotel and was assisted by Kripa, Tiffany. Clear instructions are given and the room is clean! Comfortable bed, amenities are very complete. Like it expecially the surroundings are convenient!

title: My go-to hotel for all SG trips!
desc: Grand Park City Hall is a tremendous hotel, well located in central Singapore, with some of the more hospitable staff you could hope for. This hotel is walking distance to many local attractions with plenty of options for great food and drink nearby (Robertson Quay, Boat Quay, and Chijmes naming a few). The hotel is modern, clean, and comfortable with spacious rooms that are well maintained and a restaurant with a good set of options. It‚Äôs Ismail, Lornie, Iwan, and the rest of the concierge team make this hotel special. After over 2 years since my previous visit they remembered me immediately and always kicked off my day with their warm wishes. Appreciate their service so much! I travel to SG regularly and GPCH is my go-to every time. It hasn‚Äôt failed me in nearly 30

title: Value stay
desc: Value stay that comes with breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktail session! Room is great with use of technology. Perfect pillows. Just that the dining area doesn‚Äôt face the tv. Otherwise all is great!!

title: excellent staycay
desc: Finally we can have staycation with my friends..Swimming pool was great but bec of restrictions we all were not able to get a slot together but the pool was very nice..The staff from lobby Ismail to front desk kripa was always out of the way to help us...Ricco from the restaurant too..Thank You everyone..

title: good service and nice area
desc: services and breakfast was great! location is in the center super cool i can walk from hotel to MBS or CBD Ismail and Lornie helped me a lot with the luggage thank you so much! will be back again soon!

title: Great hospitality
desc: The staff have been very helpful @Melody and @Tiffany were prompt in attending to our requests. Would definitely recommend it to my family and friends. Due to covid we were little apprehensive about our stay but it has been very good so far.

title: Review
desc: A great location to have the hotel situated with many shops and facilities around the area..From check In to check out everything was great.. Reception staff especially Ms kripa and Ms Vicky were extremely helpful at the reception like wise to all the staff too. Will definitely return back.

title: Poor quality high price
desc: Unfortunately this hotel did not stack up to anything I am use to and I travel a lot Rooms small food crap and no place to relax or bar to enjoy The cost for this type of hotel should be under $200 and the star rating need to be changed for sure not 4.5 or above I would think more like 3.5 would be tops

title: Felt like home!
desc: Our family just finished a 2 week stay at the Grand Park City Hall. Location is fantastic! Central to everything if you have no car as city hall mrt station is 5 mins walk away. Funan centre next door is completely revamped with lots and lots of good food. Shopping all near by with Raffles city (more food!), marina square and Suntec city all linked via underpass mall walkways. The kids swam in the fantastic pool every day and you can take a short bus ride down hill street to Chinatown where you will get all the local food in Hong Lim complex and Smith Street. The best part of our stay was the way the hotel staff took care of us especially the housekeeping team. We always had a clean room when we got back from exploring with clean towels and sheets. Bottled water was provided

title: A Home Away From Home
desc: As soon as we arrived here the staff were attentive and thoughtful. We were needing some extra TLC as we were stressed and tired, and they instantly gave us some extra attention. They went out of their way to provide special care on the day of departure, offering to extend our stay and allowing us to use facilities. I simply could not fault this Hotel and I encourage anyone considering a stay here, go ahead and book now! - from Brett and Nicole Hore

title: Nice hotel and friendly employees
desc: Hotel situated at strategic location. I will go again to this hotel - the employees were friendly, they attended to my needs and requests with no delay. Breakfast was excellent. Overall service quality is excellent for reasonable room rate.

title: Absolutely awesome check in experience!
desc: I showed up at the hotel before 10am and was greeted by Tiffany and Iwan. Tiffany helped me check in and was able to get me early into my room. She personally rushed to check on the room, made my overnight flight easy and had a great sense of customer care.

title: A Good Peaceful place to stay...
desc: With few malls nearby..lots of food choices, movie theatre nearby, Although they don't have Netflix / Disney plus...just local channels with HBO & Cinemax. Theres No Bidet in the toilets. Quite a cramp in the shower room as the glass door is huge.

title: Nice room
desc: Pros: Nice big clean room and love the bathroom/toilet. Cons: There is too much empty space in the bedroom and not enough furniture e.g chairs/table so we ended up having to put our belongings on the floor or by the daybed beside the window. We wanted to have a meal together while watching TV but the internet connection was slow and there was no netflix, the TV was also not able to be tilted towards us so we had to sit on the bed to watch it.

title: The AC ruin all other good things
desc: except for the AC that couldn"t be turn on again after turning it off. all other aspect is good to very good. please fix the problem, because we'd like to come back and stay with you again. but only if the AC condition is fixed

title: Perfect!!!
desc: An amazing place to stay. Great location. The Ramadan breakfast was very well organized (really happy and amazed with that). Staff very professional, kind, helpful and very cool ( all of them, but mostly Aini and Iwan). We are really happy that we are staying here. If we come to Singapore again, we will definitely choose the Grand Park City Hall again. Thank you very much!!! ü§©ü§©

title: Very friendly and accommodating front desk
desc: Hotel close to many of the main tourist attractions and harbour. Staff at front desk were friendly and accommodating. A relaxed experience which made our stay in Singapore all the better. Would definitely come back.

title: THANKZ
desc: Could send a Thankz message to the person who checked in for me he is real good and profession in his job really happy meeting him. I actually doesn't really have much time to have the room tidy but the stuff did a real quick and it really a clean stay for me too after his quick clean I asked for thankz. and thank Grand Park City Hall and all the stuff too THANKZ ALOT

title: Feedback for Kripa
desc: This my 2nd time at Grand Park City Hall with my Husband. I was served by staff Kripa at the front desk, she was so friendly and accommodating to us as initially she gave us a deluxe room when in my booking it was stated as premier room. So she assisted us to change our room and amend according. She also found out that we just got married by my henna I guess. And she offered us a late check out at 2pm for our 3d2n stay and also gave us a complimentary High Tea on one of the day. We were so pleased by it and thank you so much for having us. We had a good stay!

title: Great value, convenient, clean rooms.
desc: I stayed for a week, staff was very friendly, elevators were nice, the bathroom is ...cool, you'll see ;). The pool area beside the gym is cosy, with pool chairs to relax in. These facilities are also wheelchair accessible, they have a special elevator and ramps. This minor detail was thoughtful of management. The gym has treadmills, fly, shoulder and chest press cable machines, the dumbbells go up to 20kg. Breakfast at the restaurant was good, the quality, service and value was there. The location is fantastic, it's a < 5 min walk to City Hall MRT. If you haven't been on the MRT, get on the MRT and taste what proper public transportation should be like. I'd be happy to stay here again.

title: Weekend staycation
desc: Front line staff was rather slow in handling Check in customer and Check out counter was left with 1 staff handing many customer. Overall cleanness was good but the ceiling fan was making loud noise when turn on, suppose it need some maintenance to it.

title: We love Grand Park City Hall
desc: I had a great customer experience throughout my stay here. Audrey from the Sales team was so kind to bring me around for a Hotel tour and patient in handling my enquiries. It was also nice of her to send some Easter gifts for my kids. Thankyou. Check-in process was very smooth with the lovely ladies, Vickey and Tiffany from Front Desk. Uncle Lornie was always so happy and ready to assist us. Thankyou to the housekeeping team too for attending to what we need and keeping the room clean. We also received a nice welcome bowl of fruits from the hotel. My family and I really love our stay here.

title: Day-cation
desc: Everything was fine from check-in to check-out. Pretty quick and easy process. The room was pretty huge, lots of walking space. Clean air, clean bedding and a very nice long sofa bench to sit or lay on. Ample natural light from the long window. But the hot water supply and the water pressure can be improved in the shower room.

title: Good location to stay
desc: Good location to stay and experience the surrounding. Food, shopping and also many historical sites to visit n know singapore a bit more. As every places are just a stone throw away. Your can either walk n stroll n enjoy the view or take a bus or mrt, which is the easiest way to get around in Singapore.

title: Grandpark city hall
desc: Mediocre Hotel. Good stay but bad in room amenities. TV was lagging extremely and no efforts made to change. Service staff were attentive. Extremely small gym. Personally i would believe it is a good 4 start hotel than being a 5 star hotel.

title: 2.5 weeks business trip
desc: Overs good experience and grey value for money! Location is excellent (MRT, Raffles City, Funan). Checkin efficient, good app to make bookings at hotel and control room. Room very nice no clean and internet very fast. Only small point is staff at breakfast need to pay more attention to hygiene when serving food or touching coffee cups or glasses. Sometimes not careful. A little training will do

title: Overall wonderful staff, clean rooms great stay!
desc: Sending my regards to your friendly hardworking staff thank you for the beautiful and comfortable stay! Food is good, service is welcoming free parking and clean room nothing that we can fault really!!!! Take care we will be back again!

title: Lovely stay with exceptional service and amenities!
desc: Booked a staycation with my partner last weekend on 19-20th March 22 for birthday celebration. We stayed in the Coleman Suite which includes a private in-room outdoor garden and jacuzzi. The room was huge (would be big enough for family stay) and very clean, the toilet had a very spacious tub and steamshower. We arrived at the hotel for check in and was greeted at the lobby by Lornie, he was welcoming and friendly and brought us up straight to the suite! He assisted us with check in while going up to the room and gave us a short tour around the room and showed us the amenities. He even wished me a Happy Birthday, check in was a very pleasant experience. The suite package included high tea set, club access (including free flow alcohol) and breakfast. The food was very nice,

title: Staycay
desc: good value and convenient app for the room. breakfast was ok but its just ala carte not buffet. pool is nice and warm at night, it should open til a little later at night, the staff came reminding people its closing every other minute after 8.30, haha, it was amusing.

title: Amazing hotel.
desc: I book this hotel because it was recently renovated. I love that i can unlocked the door & lift using my phone. So that‚Äôs a plus for me. I don‚Äôt really need to queue for the check in coz i can just check in using the app. Bathroom is big. Bed is big. Amazing

title: Tech Failed Staycation
desc: As a hotel that promotes the seamless check-in and use of technology and their app for guests' stay, this really was not the case. The app didn't allow us to check-in even 24 hours before our stay. We still had to check in at the counter, which was fine, except the reception guided us through the app to get our mobile key and spoke to us like we were incompetent. When I showed them the request needed their approval, there was no apology, just a quick press of buttons and she said: no, it should be okay, you check! Of course it was okay now, you just approved it. The app key to activate the lift was also temperamental - ended up using the physical card many times. The app for in-room control of the air con or lights (there are no switches for anything in the room) also did not

title: Nice
desc: Overall was nice . Room was clean and tidy. Space is big but very limited wall plugs for us to use. Would be nice to have wall plug beside the bed for easier access. The bed was comfortable and nice to sleep in.

title: Great Location & Nice Room
desc: It's a great location as it is so near to shopping mall like Funan which is just next door, also you can walk to City Hall, Marina Sq, Esplanade in minutes. Rooms were beautiful, huge bed that could accomodate us family of 4 (with young kids).

title: Very good breakfast service
desc: Hotel has got a very good location. Great service during the breakfast at Tablescape-- Many thanks to Irman and Ganeson! Would come back for their excellent service! The room is quite dim as it is facing the opposite building and there is no view though I booked a premier room.

title: Average
desc: Air con was not working. Had to call the front desk thrice and eventually had a change of room at 3am‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Yes, 3am because we could not sleep. The attitude of the service staffs were okay, although we had a downgrade of rooms at the end, the aircon was working perfectly in the other room.

title: Hair dryer with smoke. Not safety and poor quality and services
desc: I have booked 2 rooms staycation with my daughters. Abit disappointed on the room services, no slipper. Need to call and remind them, took long to deliver. 1 of the hair dryer spoilt. Quality is poor, smoke came out suddenly and we called for a replacement, technician came and took away,, waited and no replace. Room facing peninsula plaza corridor, u can see opposite people smoking and hang out there. No view. Personally I don't think this is a 5 stars Hotel.

title: Pleasant stay!
desc: Room is clean and tastefully designed. Value for money, very good location. Check in and out was a breeze. A gem in the city! Did not have time to visit the pool. Will be back again during the hols!!!

title: Terrible bug bites
desc: It was for our honeymoon. But there‚Äôs rlly nth really pleasant at all. Booked the junior suite which promises a warm jacuzzi. But was told by the staff it takes awhile to heat up. Waited from 1pm to 4/5pm and it finally turned slightly warm. Not sure if it‚Äôs due to the hot weather or the device itself. No other amenities in the room as well like nespresso machine. And the worst of all, next day we realized how many bug bites we have all over our body (which we were quite sure they‚Äôre bed bugs but was told that they did a thorough check and found none). And the itch was unbearable. It‚Äôs sad because we were so looking forward to this stay and it was the last stay of our one week hotel hopping honeymoon. To think we actually paid $700+ for this stay which the room size ain‚Äôt big

title: Stay at this property only if you have patience
desc: Carry your own mugs and utensils and may be a maid too as the staff here doesn't bother to clean your rooms even if the food you had starts stinking with left overs. No one really cares about customer service here honestly.

title: Daycation
desc: Nice and quiet place with alots of amenities around. Check in was fast and efficient. Room is clean and tidy. They provide complimentary parking which many places does not provide. Nice interior deco and renovation.

title: Very comfortable and clean stay
desc: Hotel is really well maintained and looks super clean. Overall extremely pleasant experience and would highly recommend. Location is also very convenient, and very near to malls like Funan as well as the national gallery. Check in and Check out was smooth, no complains.

title: Daycation
desc: The front staff was friendly. I'm in love with the room. The bed is so comfortable.It was very cosy and neat. Most convenient you can do a contactless check in. It's conveniently located for food and shopping. Definitely will come back again

title: We never visit again
desc: The room and location is fine but the service is not acceptable. Phone go to voice mail most of the time and waited for hours when requesting for items, even request more than one time before receiving the items we request. Put indication for housekeeping but housekeeping did not happen.

title: 3D2N with 1-for-1 promotion, won't book without promo
desc: If you are looking for a relaxing staycation with customer service, look elsewhere. The hotel facility is rather new but not well maintained, the hotel did fix them after I inform them of the issue as I felt it was hazardous. Beddings were comfortable, but we did not sleep well because the pillows were extremely uncomfortable. It was an odd shape, extremely high and hard. F&B was average, 1 of the F&B staff was particularly chatty and I found the whole dinning experience a little noisy. I'm a coffee addict but this is the first time I hate the coffee so much I had only 1 sip of it. This is a first for my experience with hotel's coffee. The pool is rather small, sufficient for 4-5 groups of guest as most guest brought children along. However, no one was there to monitor the

title: Breakfast in hotel was atrocious
desc: Could have given 0 stars if trip advisor allows. Breakfast in hotel was the worst I've ever had. Bread was hard as rock, milk and coffee were diluted (wow), cereal tasted really weird, orange juice was diluted too (wow). The only edible food In the entire 2 days breakfast is the prepacked ready made yoghurt that they probably order from outsourced. That's how bad it is.

title: Clean and rightly priced
desc: Excellent location. Clean rooms. Great service. Located in the heart of the city, very near mrt. Plenty of historic buildings nearby. Near plenty of malls and restaurants. Food choices are endless. A bit of walk is clark quay. Rooms are clean. Staff are excellent. Overall, vaule for money.

title: Generally Positive for Staycation
desc: Generally Positive for Staycation. Check in was smooth and easy with complimentary bread snacks, at individual waiting table. Short waiting time. Dining experience was positive for breakfast. Room service is little bit too pricy however.

title: Breakfast is bad
desc: The food is served is cold and over cooked. Tasted like overnight as even the bread texture is hard. I requested for additional butter, the waitress told me out of stock! 1st time experience this. The worst breakfast that I expect from a hotel.

title: 1st staycation for our little one!
desc: Since we cannot travel this year we decided to bring our little stay away from home experience. After looking through the hotel choice, we decided not to choose a hotel in town but also somewhere nearby where is convenience to travel to different places. Throughout our 3 days 2 nights stay, We bring our little one to MBS, Suntec and Orchard where we believe that the little had fun but we are both tired. Transport to all of these places is convenience via public transport. The experience was good, the hotel look nice and new. Friendly staffs welcome us and make our registration fast and easy. Everything is fine till we go to the restaurant in the hotel, the service is unpleasant and food is disappointing.

title: Best bathtub
desc: One of the best bathtub experience I had in SG. Great location for food and shopping, service was great overall. Had a welcome gift and drinks. Asked for extra towels and was given without entry to room to ensure safe distancing.

title: Excellent stay in Grand Park City Hall
desc: Find this hotel through online and book through klook.com Came together with my other half and we totally enjoy our stay and still have the post staycay syndrome.. cannot bear to leave the hotel when it's time to check out..

title: Clean & modern hotel
desc: Nice ambience. Clean. however got to buck up during check in. Such a long queue during check in. Some miscommunication on going during the check in that when i'm already in the room tried to book swimming slot all is full for the next morning.

title: Overall ok except the bed.
